description_en:
**Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 07 - Nude** offers exceptional performance. Its lightweight texture feels fresh and weightless, providing high coverage, waterproof, transfer-proof and lasting up to 16 hours.  It's also free of silicones, parabens, mineral oil, and microplastic particles. For a matte finish!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 07 - Nude**:
â­ Apply the foundation to clean, moisturized skin using a brush or sponge.
â­ Blend evenly across your face for desired coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 07 - Nude**:
â­ Mica, Kaolin, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia/Tetraphylla Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, P-Anisic Acid, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Magnesium Oxide, Alumina, Citric Acid, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

â­ Aqua (water), synthetic beeswax, glyceryl stearate, copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax, butylene glycol, vp/hexadecene copolymer, palmitic acid, pvp, chamomilla recutita (matricaria) flower water, calendula officinalis flower water, stearic acid, acacia senegal gum, aminomethyl propanol, hydrated silica, polyvinyl alcohol, ethylhexylglycerin, xanthan gum, phenoxyethanol, sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, ci 77499 (iron oxides).

**Essence Bye Panda Eyes! Volume DeFoundation Mascara 01** says goodbye to panda eyes! This amazing mascara keeps your makeup flawless all day long. â­ Vegan and oil-free formula. â­ Deep black lash coverage. â­ All-day wear, even with sweat and tears. â­ No clumping or crumbling. â­ Easy removal with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Bye Panda Eyes! Volume DeFoundation Mascara 01**: 
â­ Start at the base of the lash line. 
â­ Wiggle the wand back and forth. 
â­ Add as many coats as desired to achieve your desired length and volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Bye Panda Eyes! Volume DeFoundation Mascara 01**: 
â­ Aqua (water), carnauba (copernicia cerifera) wax, cera alba (beeswax), butylene glycol, stearic acid, vp/eicosene copolymer, palmitic acid, polybutene, glyceryl stearate, acacia senegal gum, candelilla (euphorbia cerifera) wax, pvp, caprylyl glycol, polyvinyl alcohol, aminomethyl propanol, sodium dehydroacetate, phenoxyethanol, ci 77499 (iron oxides).

description_en:
**Essence Conceal Like A Pro Colour Correcting Palette**: Achieve a flawless complexion with this amazing palette! â­ Effectively covers imperfections and corrects skin tone. â­ Creamy-soft texture for easy application. â­ Perfect for concealing redness, dark spots, and dark circles. â­ Gives you a radiant and fresh complexion. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Conceal Like A Pro Colour Correcting Palette**: 
â­ Green: neutralizes redness. â­ Yellow: brightens dark spots. â­ Red: conceals dark circles. â­ Purple: anti-dullness. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Conceal Like A Pro Colour Correcting Palette**: 
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Mica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Synthetic Wax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Silica, Copernicia Cerifera Cera (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax), Tocopheryl Acetate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Aluminum Hydroxide, May Contain/ [+/-]: CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

The **Essence Jurassic World Highlighter Brush** is the perfect partner for every highlighter. The brush features a rose gold design, an orange and pink dinosaur print handle and is stamped with the movie logo.

**Essence Stay 8H Waterproof Lipliner 04- Red**, a waterproof lip liner for perfect lips that last. â­ Waterproof, even against food, coffee, and kisses! â­ Lasts up to eight hours. â­ Smooth, highly pigmented texture that glides on easily without drying out your lips. â­ Retractable pencil with built-in sharpener. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Stay 8H Waterproof Lipliner 04- Red**: â­ Start from the inner corner of your lips, drawing a thin line towards the outer corner. â­ Use the built-in sharpener to maintain sharp lines. â­ Apply your favorite lipstick over the lip liner. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Stay 8H Waterproof Lipliner 04- Red**: â­ Dimethicone, â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate, â­ Synthetic fluorphlogopite, â­ Polyisobutene, â­ Acrylates/Stearyl acrylate/Dimethicone methacrylate copolymer, â­ Polyethylene, â­ Ozokerite, â­ Isobutyl stearate, â­ Pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, â­ Lake 1550, â­ Redi-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate 1550 CI 77491 (Iron oxides), â­ CI 77499 (Iron oxides), â­ CI 77891 (Titanium dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 05** delivers salon-quality shine and vibrant color that lasts. This long-lasting, quick-drying formula makes creating the perfect manicure easy and effortless. It's also vegan and paraben-free. â­ Long-lasting gel-like shine â­ Vibrant, rich colors â­ Quick-drying formula â­ Vegan & paraben-free

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 05**: â­ Apply two coats of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 05** over a base coat. â­ No UV lamp needed. â­ For a perfect finish, use a top coat. â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct heat and sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 05**: â­ Aqua (Water) â­ Cyclopentasiloxane â­ Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone â­ Dimethiconol â­ Cyclohexasiloxane â­ Sodium Chloride â­ C30-45 Alkyl Methicone â­ C30-45 Olefin â­ Mica â­ Polysorbate 80 â­ Trimethoxycaprylylsilane â­ Hydrolyzed Wheat Gluten â­ Ethylhexylglycerin â­ Ceratonia Siliqua Gum â­ Triethoxycaprylylsilane â­ Phenoxyethanol â­ May Contain: Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

**Essence Super Strong 2in1 Base & Top Coat** is an ultra-resistant nail polish that provides flawless nails for longer. â­  Moisturizing formula strengthens nails. â­ Dries quickly. â­ Ideal for a professional home manicure. â­ In an independent study, 90% of users confirmed that their nails became harder after two weeks of use (self-assessment by 50 women).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Super Strong 2in1 Base & Top Coat**: â­ ETHYL ACETATE, NITROCELLULOSE, BUTYL ACETATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL DIBENZOATE, TRIETHYL CITRATE, ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER, ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, MALTOL, RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, PISTACIA LENTISCUS ) GUM, CI 15880 (RED 34 LAKE), CI 77510 (FERRIC AMMONIUM FERROCYANIDE).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Another Volume Mascara - Just Better - Black**:

â­ Allow the first coat to dry before applying another coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Another Volume Mascara - Just Better - Black**:
â­ Aqua (water)

description_en:
**Essence Camouflage Matt Concealer 26** is a waterproof concealer that mattifies the skin and effectively covers dark circles and shadows under the eyes thanks to its high coverage. It can even temporarily conceal tattoos!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Camouflage Matt Concealer 26**:
â­ Use before or after foundation on uneven skin.
â­ Perfect for contouring: Apply to the forehead, chin, and bridge of the nose in a shade lighter than your skin tone.
â­ To conceal dark circles: Apply in an inverted triangle shape under the eye and blend gently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Camouflage Matt Concealer 26**:
â­ AQUA (WATER) â­ CYCLOPENTASILOXANE â­ ISODODECANE â­ TALC â­ HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE â­ ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE â­ GLYCERIN â­ POLYGLYCERYL-4 ISOSTEARATE â­ CETYL PEG/PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE â­ HEXYL LAURATE â­ CYCLOHEXASILOXANE â­ POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSHLIDE â­ TOCOPHEROL â­ SODIUM COROL /PPG-19/19 DIMETHICONE â­ CERA ALBA (BEESWAX) â­ DISODIUM EDTA â­ XANTHAN GUM â­ ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN â­ BHT â­ TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE â­ ALUMINUM/MAGNESIUM HYDROXIDE STEARATE â­ PHENOXYETHANOL â­ PERFUME (FRAGRANCE) â­ CI 77491 â­ CI 77492 â­ CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES) â­ CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

description_en:
**Essence Gimme Glow** Luminous Highlighter 20: The **Essence Gimme Glow** luminous highlighter is easy to apply and blend thanks to its buttery soft powder texture. With its buildable coverage, you can create effects of varying intensity - from a soft glow to bold luminous accents on your face.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Gimme Glow**: 
â­ Apply the desired amount to your cheekbones or any area you want to highlight.
â­ Blend gently using a makeup brush or sponge.
â­ Build coverage for a natural or bold look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Gimme Glow**: 
â­ Mica, Talc, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Magnesium Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-1, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Tin Oxide, Silica, Magnesium Oxide, Alumina, Phenoxyethanol, Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 08 - Nude**: This lightweight powder foundation provides a refreshing feel with high coverage that lasts up to 16 hours. It's waterproof and suitable for all skin types.  Free of silicones, parabens, mineral oil, and microplastic particles. Get a matte, radiant complexion all day long!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 08 - Nude**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of powder to clean, dry skin using a brush or sponge.
â­ Distribute the powder evenly on your face for perfect coverage.
â­ Use it for a perfect finish to your makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 08 - Nude**:
â­ Mica
â­ Kaolin
â­ Zea Mays (Corn) Starch
â­ Shea Butter Ethyl Esters
â­ Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax
â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil
â­ Macadamia Integrifolia/Tetraphylla Seed Oil
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ P-Anisic Acid
â­ Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract
â­ Magnesium Oxide
â­ Alumina
â­ Citric Acid
â­ CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides)
â­ CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)

**Essence Wow What A Brow Pen Waterproof 04** is perfect for defined and bushy eyebrows. This waterproof eyebrow pen ensures long-lasting eyebrow makeup. Its innovative water-drop shaped tip is ideal for easily filling in eyebrow gaps for a natural look. It includes an integrated brush on the other end to blend and distribute the product evenly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Wow What A Brow Pen Waterproof 04**:
â­ Start by drawing a thin line along your natural eyebrow shape.
â­ Use the pen tip to fill in any gaps.
â­ Use the brush to blend the color naturally.

**Essence Pretty Natural Hydrating Found. 200**: Achieve a flawless, natural look with this perfect foundation. Create unique and captivating eye looks with its diverse and coordinated shades. â­ Vibrant, highly pigmented colors. â­ Smooth and blendable formula. â­ Varied finishes: matte, shimmer, and metallic. â­ Perfect for both day and night looks. â­ Integrated mirror.

**Essence Soft & Precise Lip Pencil 304** is a smooth and precise lip liner designed for perfectly defined lips.  The **Essence Soft & Precise Lip Pencil 304** is known for its silky, highly pigmented formula, ensuring precise definition and long-lasting intense color. Enjoy perfectly defined lips with a velvety matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Soft & Precise Lip Pencil 304**:
â­ Carefully outline your lip shape with the pencil.
â­ Fill in your lips completely or partially as desired.
â­ Use with Essence lipstick for a perfect look.

â­ C10-18 Triglycerides

Its lightweight formula offers medium coverage, concealing redness and evening out skin tone for a flawless, natural look all day long.

â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Essence Pretty Natural Hydrating Found. 190- Nude** to your skin.
â­ Blend evenly using a makeup sponge or brush.
â­ Build coverage as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Pretty Natural Hydrating Found. 190- Nude**:
â­ AQUA (WATER), CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, TALC, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, PEG-10 DIMETHICONE, GLYCERIN, CETYL PEG/PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, TROPOLONE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, SODIUM PHYTATE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Soft Touch Mousse Make-Up 02- Beige**:

description_en:
**Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Primer Serum Hydrate & Plump**: Achieve a radiant and healthy-looking complexion with this lightweight primer serum.  It's formulated with hyaluronic acid and squalane to deeply hydrate and plump your skin. Perfect for everyday use. â­Preps skin for makeup application. â­Provides deep hydration. â­Creates a radiant glow. â­Contains blueberry extract. â­Lightweight and fast-absorbing. â­Suitable for all skin types. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Primer Serum Hydrate & Plump**: â­Apply a thin layer after moisturizer to the entire face or target areas needing extra hydration. â­Can be used alone or as a makeup base. â­For best results, use daily. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Primer Serum Hydrate & Plump**: â­Aqua (water), glycerin, vaccinium myrtillus fruit water, pentylene glycol, squalane, sodium acetylated hyaluronate, sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer, hydrolyzed sodium hyaluronate, sodium hyaluronate, tocopherol, xanthan gum, sodium lauryl sulfoacetate, sodium oleoyl sarcosinate, ethylhexylglycerin, sodium gluconate, sodium chloride, sodium oleate, sodium sulfate, citric acid, phenoxyethanol, sodium benzoate, parfum (fragrance), ci 42090 (blue 1).

description_en:
**Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Volume Mascara** is a naturally enriched mascara designed to give your lashes ultimate volume and a deep black color. With coconut oil and vegetable waxes, **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Volume Mascara** nourishes and strengthens your lashes, making them appear fuller and more beautiful. Its rich formula is made with 93% natural ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Volume Mascara**
â­ Apply a thin layer of mascara to your lashes, from root to tip.
â­ Allow the first coat to dry before applying a second coat, if desired.
â­ To remove, use a gentle makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Volume Mascara**
â­ AQUA (WATER)
â­ RHUS VERNICIFLUA PEEL CERA (RHUS VERNICIFLUA PEEL WAX)
â­ GLYCERYL STEARATE
â­ ACACIA SENEGAL GUM
â­ STEARIC ACID
â­ ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN WAX
â­ GLYCERIN
â­ PALMITIC ACID

â­ AMINOMETHYL PROPANOL
â­ COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL
â­ VP/EICOSENE COPOLYMER

**Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Glow Serum Primer - Transparent** is a hydrating primer with a lightweight, fast-absorbing gel texture that gives you a healthy, natural glow. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Lightweight and non-greasy formula. â­ Provides intense hydration. â­ Makes makeup application easier and helps it last longer. â­ Gives your skin a radiant and youthful look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Glow Serum Primer - Transparent**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to cleansed and dry skin before applying foundation or makeup.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Glow Serum Primer - Transparent**:
â­ Aqua (water), glycerin, caprylic/capric triglyceride, niacinamide, citrullus lanatus (watermelon) fruit water, decyl glucoside, isopropyl myristate, pentylene glycol, glycol distearate, tocopherol, carbomer, coco-glucoside, sodium ascorbyl phosphate, ethylhexylglycerin, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) peel oil, sodium chloride, sodium sulfate, sodium hydroxide, citric acid, phenoxyethanol, sodium benzoate, parfum (fragrance), limonene, ci 14700 (red 4).

description_en:
**Essence Make Me Eyebrow Gel Mascara 04- Medium**: This tinted eyebrow gel mascara gives you full and perfectly defined eyebrows. â­ Features tiny fibers that fill in gaps for a natural look. â­ Perfect brush for easy and precise application. â­ Ideal for adding fullness and shaping your brows. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Make Me Eyebrow Gel Mascara 04- Medium**: â­ Apply the product using the brush, starting from the bottom of the brow and brushing upwards. â­ Repeat until desired fullness is achieved. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Make Me Eyebrow Gel Mascara 04- Medium**: â­ AQUA (WATER), ALCOHOL DENAT., VP/VA COPOLYMER, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, GYLCERIN, TROPOLONE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, NYLON-6, GALACTOARABINAN, DISODIUM EDTA, SILICA, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, CI 77007 (ULTRAMARINES), CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77492 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

description_en:
**Essence Superfine Eyeliner Pen Waterproof**: Experience the precision and long-lasting wear of our superfine eyeliner pen, now available in a waterproof formula. Its slim felt tip allows for both thin and bold eyeliner styles. Enjoy smudge-proof definition all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Superfine Eyeliner Pen Waterproof**:
â­ For a subtle line, lightly brush the tip across your lash line from inner to outer corner.
â­ For best results, apply as close to your lash line as possible.
â­ To create a cat eye, draw the outer border starting from the outer edge and fill in with the liner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Superfine Eyeliner Pen Waterproof**:
â­ Aqua (water)
â­ Polyester-5
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ 1,2-Hexanediol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Polyaspartate
â­ Sodium Acetate
â­ Simethicone
â­ Polysorbate 65
â­ Glyceryl Stearate
â­ Methylcellulose
â­ Sulfuric Acid
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Alumina
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Sodium Dehydroacetate
â­ Sorbic Acid
â­ CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)

**Essence Coverstick 30- Nude**: Say goodbye to imperfections! This coverstick quickly and effectively conceals small spots, redness, and skin impurities. Enriched with Bisabolol, Allantoin, and Farnesol to soothe stressed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Coverstick 30- Nude**:
â­ Use an upward patting motion; don't rub it in.

â­ For a natural look, add a touch of moisturizer before applying foundation for maximum coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Coverstick 30- Nude**:

**Essence Soft Touch Mousse Make-Up 56** offers a super delicate mousse texture that gives your face a smooth and natural-looking matt complexion while allowing your skin to breathe freely. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Soft Touch Mousse Make-Up 56**

â­ Build up product until desired coverage is achieved.

This nail polish boasts a unique formula that dries in just 40 seconds. â­ Stunning color with long-lasting wear. â­ Quick-drying (40 seconds). â­ Convenient small bottle fits any handbag. â­ Wide range of colors to suit all tastes. â­ Shiny finish. â­ Perfect for everyday use. â­ Ideal for quick touch-ups. â­ Gives your nails a professional look. â­ Easy to apply. â­ Long-lasting formula.

title_ar: **Ø§ÙŠØ³ÙŠÙ†Ø³ Ø¨Ø±ÙŠØªÙŠ ÙØ§Ø³Øª Ù…Ù†Ø§ÙƒÙŠØ± 03- Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø±**
description_en:
**Essence Pretty Fast Nailpolish 03- Red**: Get stunning nails quickly and easily at home! This nail polish boasts a unique formula that dries in just 40 seconds, letting you perfectly match your nail color to your outfit. Its small and practical bottle makes it perfect for your handbag, so you're always ready for a touch-up on the go.  Whether you prefer subtle shades or bold colors, you'll find your perfect match in the **Essence Pretty Fast Nailpolish** range.  The long-lasting, glossy finish gives you salon-worthy nails that look flawless.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Pretty Fast Nailpolish 03- Red**:
â­ Apply two coats of **Essence Pretty Fast Nailpolish 03- Red** for best color payoff and longevity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Pretty Fast Nailpolish 03- Red**:
â­ Ethyl acetate, butyl acetate, nitrocellulose, acetyl tributyl citrate, isopropyl alcohol, adipic acid/neopentyl glycol/trimellitic anhydride copolymer, acrylates copolymer, stearalkonium bentonite, zinc sulfate, mannitol, tocopherol, diacetone alcohol, hexilical-ol, hexal-a, silexa-ol lithothamnion calcareum extract, dimethicone, trimethylsiloxysilicate, diatomaceous earth, phosphoric acid, sorbic acid, ci 15850 (red 6 lake), ci 77491 (iron oxides), ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

â­ Apply color starting from the center of your upper lip outwards.

description_en:
**Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Bronzer 10**: Achieve a naturally tanned and luminous complexion with this amazing bronzer, made with 99% natural ingredients. This duo bronzer gives you a natural tan and a subtle glow, with radiant and captivating touches.  Infused with cocoa butter, it has a pleasant cocoa aroma. It combines a stunning matte shade with a beautiful, illuminating pearly shade.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Bronzer 10**:
â­ Apply a small amount of **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Bronzer 10** to your cheekbones using a bronzer brush.
â­ Blend gently for a natural look.
â­ Use the light and dark shades together for a more even, sun-kissed look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Bronzer 10**:
â­ TALC, MICA, KAOLIN, SHEA BUTTER ETHYL ESTERS, RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, MACADAMIA TERNIFOLIA SEED OIL, TOCOPHEROL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, OLUS OIL (VEGETABLE OIL), MAGNOLIA-OFFIC , MAGNESIUM OXIDE, TIN OXIDE, ALUMINA, THEOBROMA CACAO (COCOA) SEED BUTTER, CITRIC ACID, BENZYL ALCOHOL, PERFUME (FRAGRANCE), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77742 (MANGANESE CI 771), CI 77742 (MANGANESE VI89) (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

description_en:
**Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 02**: Get dreamy nails with the new and reformulated **Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 02**! The gel-like formula provides perfect coverage and a brilliant shine that lasts.  A wide range of colors, including matte and shiny shades, is available to suit all tastes. Achieve a professional-looking manicure at home easily and quickly thanks to its unique quick-drying formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 02**:
â­ Apply a base coat.
â­ Apply two coats of **Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 02**, allowing each coat to dry completely before applying the next.
â­ Use a top coat for protection and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 02**:
â­ ETHYL ACETATE
â­ BUTYL ACETATE
â­ NITROCELLULOSE
â­ ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER
â­ ALCOHOL
â­ STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE
â­ DIACETONE ALCOHOL
â­ MALTOL
â­ SILICA
â­ ACTINIDIA CHINENSIS (KIWI) FRUIT EXTRACT
â­ TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE
â­ PISTACIA LENTISCUS (MASTIC) GUM
â­ PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAISOSTEARATE
â­ MICROCRYSTALLINE CELLULOSE
â­ BARIUM SULFATE
â­ MAGNESIUM STEARATE
â­ ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE
â­ PHOSPHORIC ACID
â­ POTASSIUM SORBATE
â­ CI 15850 (RED 6)
â­ CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES)
â­ CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES)
â­ CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

**Essence Perfect Matte Lipstick 01** offers matte lips in seductive colorsâ€”a true statement for every look. This perfect matte lipstick is very easy to apply, feels pleasantly soft, and leaves behind a long-lasting matte effect. Available in a variety of trendy colors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Perfect Matte Lipstick 01**: 
â­ Apply **Essence Perfect Matte Lipstick 01**, starting at the center of your upper lip and moving outward toward the corners.
â­ Repeat on your bottom lip.
â­ For a softer application, use your finger to gently dab on the color.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Stay 8H Waterproof Lipliner 06- Red**: â­ Ensure your lips are clean and dry before application. â­ Start by drawing a thin line along your natural lip line. â­ You can use the lip liner as a base for your favorite lipstick. â­ To remove **Essence Stay 8H Waterproof Lipliner 06- Red**, use a suitable makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Stay 8H Waterproof Lipliner 06- Red**: â­ (Full ingredient list will be provided here upon availability).

**Essence Tiny Tip Precise Brow Pen 02**: Achieve perfectly natural and dramatic brows with the **Essence Tiny Tip Precise Brow Pen 02**. This pen delivers precise and easy application with a semi-permanent formula for long-lasting results. â­ Ultra-fine tip for precise definition â­ Easy to use and fill in gaps â­ Natural and dramatic finish â­ Perfect for all skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Tiny Tip Precise Brow Pen 02**: â­ Start at the beginning of your brow and work your way to the end. â­ Gently fill in any gaps. â­ Use a spoolie to brush your brows after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Tiny Tip Precise Brow Pen 02**: â­ AQUA (WATER), â­ ALCOHOL, â­ GLYCERIN, â­ PVP, â­ PEG / PPG-14/4 DIMETHICONE, â­ PROPYLENE GLYCOL, â­ PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, â­ CIELL35 (RED 40), â­ CIELLOW 19140 BLUE 1).

**Essence 24Ever Defined Volume Mascara- Black** gives you perfectly defined and voluminous lashes that last all day. â­Provides intense volume and definition. â­Nourishing formula with hemp seed oil, almond oil, jojoba oil, and Vitamin E. â­Vegan, paraben-free, fragrance-free, and alcohol-free. â­Long-lasting formula for up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 24Ever Defined Volume Mascara- Black**: â­Apply one or more coats for desired volume. â­Start at the root of your lashes and work your way upwards. â­Allow each coat to dry before applying another.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 24Ever Defined Volume Mascara- Black**: â­aqua (water), synthetic beeswax, paraffin, glyceryl stearate, styrene / acrylates / ammonium methacrylate copolymer, butylene glycol, stearic acid, oryza sativa (rice) bran wax, palmitic acid, acacia senegal gum, phenoxyethanol, copernicia cerifera (carnauba wax), cannabis sativa seed oil, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, tocopheryl acetate, tocopherol, polybutene, vp / eicosene copolymer, glycerin, pvp, prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond) oil, trimethyl pentanyl diisobutyrate, ethylhexate 12 sulfate, caprylyl glycol, tetrasodium edta, aminomethyl propanol, potassium sorbate, sodium dehydroacetate, ci 77499 (iron oxides).

**Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 52** gives you salon-quality results at home! This gel nail polish boasts a long-lasting, high-shine finish with vibrant color. It's also vegan, cruelty-free, and paraben-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 52**:
â­ Apply a base coat.
â­ Apply two coats of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 52**.
â­ Allow each coat to dry completely before applying the next.
â­ Finish with a top coat for extra shine and protection (optional).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 52**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone

**Essence The Blush 20**, say goodbye to matt touch blush and hello to the new blush! The successor of the popular blush is even softer. description_en:
**Essence Jurassic World Eyeshadow Palette 01**, a luxurious eyeshadow palette inspired by the world of dinosaurs. It contains 8 highly pigmented colors with various finishes (matte, shimmer, duochrome), ranging from green and gold to brown and orange. Its unique design with a gold T-rex print will attract everyone's attention.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Jurassic World Eyeshadow Palette 01**:
â­ Apply an eyeshadow primer before starting.
â­ Apply base colors first.
â­ Define the crease area.
â­ Blend the colors well and add a touch of highlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Jurassic World Eyeshadow Palette 01**:
â­ No 1/8: Talc, Mica, Magnesium Stearate, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyisobutene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, May Contain/[+/-]: Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium).
â­ No 2/3/5/6: Talc, Mica, Silica, Magnesium Stearate, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyisobutene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, May Contain/[+/-]: Ci 16035 (Red 40 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).
â­ No 4: Mica, Dimethicone, Talc, Silica, Magnesium Stearate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disiloxane, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).
â­ No 7: Mica, Dimethicone, Talc, Magnesium Stearate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disiloxane, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Soft & Precise Lip Pencil 25- Nude** offers perfectly defined lips with a creamy, comfortable application. â­ Vegan formula â­ Velvety matte finish â­ High pigmentation â­ Easy to use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Soft & Precise Lip Pencil 25- Nude**:

**Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 02** is the popular powder that gives you a gorgeous matte complexion. Its smooth, silky texture glides effortlessly onto your skin, providing a natural, shine-free look as if created by a professional makeup artist.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 02**:
â­ Dip the included brush in the powder, ensuring the bristles are evenly coated.
â­ Gently apply the powder to your T-zone (forehead, nose).
â­ Lightly dab under your eyes, down your cheeks, and along your jawline.
â­ Use the brush to gently smooth out any patches for a flawless, even finish.
â­ Reapply every few hours as needed. Its compact size makes it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 02**:
â­ Talc
â­ Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­ Sapphire Powder

â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Hexylene Glycol
â­ Phenoxyethanol

The **Essence My Little Gold Highlighter Palette** is a perfect addition to any makeup collection. Thanks to its soft and shimmery texture, you'll achieve flawless highlights on your nose bridge, cheekbones, and brow bone. The integrated mirror makes it easy to refresh your glow on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence My Little Gold Highlighter Palette**
â­ Apply a suitable amount of product to your cheekbones, nose bridge, and brow bone.
â­ Gently blend the product using a brush or your fingers.
â­ Use different shades to achieve a natural or bolder look.

**Essence Soft Touch Mousse Make-Up 04- Beige**: This super delicate mousse texture foundation gives your face a smooth and natural-looking matt complexion while allowing your skin to breathe freely. Achieve a flawless, natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Soft Touch Mousse Make-Up 04- Beige**:
â­ After priming and moisturizing, dip sponge, brush, or fingers into product.
â­ Sweep and buff product in place, blending upwards and outwards for a flawless look.
â­ Build up product until desired coverage is achieved.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Soft Touch Mousse Make-Up 04- Beige**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane

description_en:
**Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 01** offers a salon-quality manicure at home! Get gel-like shine and vibrant color that lasts. This quick-drying formula creates the perfect manicure with ease. Vegan and paraben-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 01**: 
â­ Apply a base coat.
â­ Apply two coats of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 01**.
â­ For longer-lasting wear, use a top coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 01**: 
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone
â­ Dimethiconol
â­ Cyclohexasiloxane
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ C30-45 Alkyl Methicone
â­ C30-45 Olefin
â­ Mica
â­ Polysorbate 80
â­ Trimethoxycaprylylsilane
â­ Hydrolyzed Wheat Gluten
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Ceratonia Siliqua Gum
â­ Triethoxycaprylylsilane
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ May Contain: Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

Store in a cool and dry place. Protect from direct heat and sunlight.

description_en:
**Essence Camouflage+ Matt Concealer 70** offers flawless coverage for all skin imperfections. This concealer completely covers dark circles, hyperpigmentation, redness, pimples, and tattoos. Its waterproof formula prevents creasing or sinking into fine lines, leaving your skin brighter, smoother, and more firm.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Camouflage+ Matt Concealer 70**:
â­ Apply a small amount to dark circles, blemishes, or other problem areas using the applicator.
â­ Blend concealer using a sponge or brush.
â­ Set with powder if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Camouflage+ Matt Concealer 70**:
â­ Talc
â­ Mica
â­ Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­ Magnesium Stearate
â­ Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate
â­ Octyldodecyl Stearate
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Aluminum Hydroxide
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Ci 15850 (Red 6 Lake, Red 7 Lake)
â­ Ci 77491
â­ Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

**Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 48**: Achieve your dream nails with **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 48**.  Experience superior long-lasting gel shine, intense color payoff, and a dazzling finish. This vegan, long-lasting nail polish is available in a wide range of colors. The high pigment content ensures faster drying than traditional nail polishes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 48**:
â­ Apply two coats over a base coat for a long-lasting manicure without the need for UV light.

**Essence 24Ever Bold Volume Mascara- Black**: Get bold and unforgettable eyes with **Essence 24Ever Bold Volume Mascara- Black**. This mascara gives you incredible volume and thick lashes that last all day long.  The formula is enriched with hemp seed oil, almond oil, jojoba oil, and Vitamin E to nourish and condition your lashes. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 24Ever Bold Volume Mascara- Black**:
â­ Apply one or more coats for desired volume.
â­ Start at the base of your lashes and wiggle upwards.
â­ Let the mascara dry before applying another coat.

â­ AQUA (WATER)

description_en:
**Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Tinted Cream 20** is a super nourishing tinted day cream, perfect for a natural, radiant look. â­ Its unique formula with natural cactus flower extract, hyaluronic acid, and glycerin provides 24-hour hydration. â­ It gently covers imperfections with a super soft and light texture. â­ It gives the skin a very natural finish, suitable for daily use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Tinted Cream 20**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of cream to your skin after cleansing and moisturizing. â­ Spread the cream evenly on your face and neck. â­ Use it as a final step in your skincare routine or before applying makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Tinted Cream 20**:
â­ AQUA (WATER), â­ CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, â­ C13-15 ALKANE, â­ COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, â­ POLYGLYCERYL-4 DIISOSTEARATE/POLYHYDROXYSTEARATE/SEBACATE, â­ GLYCERIN, â­ SILICA, â­ PROPANEDIOL, â­ TRIETHYLHEXANOIN, â­ KAOLIN, â­ STEARALKONIUM HECTORITE, â­ SODIUM CHLORIDE, â­ CEREUS GRANDIFLORUS (CACTUS) FLOWER EXTRACT, â­ SODIUM HYALURONATE, â­ HYDROLYZED CAESALPINIA SPINOSA GUM, â­ LEUCONOSTOC/RADISH ROOT FERMENT FILTRATE, â­ CAESALPINIA SPINOSA GUM, â­ BUTYLENE GLYCOL, â­ PROPYLENE CARBONATE, â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, â­ CAPRYLHYDROXAMIC ACID, â­ TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, â­ ALUMINA, â­ PHENOXYETHANOL, â­ POTASSIUM SORBATE, â­ PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), â­ CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES), â­ CI 77492 (IRON OXIDES), â­ CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), â­ CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

**Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 09** delivers salon-quality shine and vibrant color that lasts. â­ Get the gel look without the UV lamp! â­  Quick-drying formula for easy application. â­ Vegan and cruelty-free. â­ Perfect for at-home manicures.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 09**: 
â­ Apply a base coat. â­ Then apply two coats of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 09**. â­ Let it dry completely. â­ Seal with a topcoat for extra shine and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 09**: 
â­ Aqua (Water) â­ Cyclopentasiloxane â­ Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone â­ Dimethiconol â­ Cyclohexasiloxane â­ Sodium Chloride â­ C30-45 Alkyl Methicone â­ C30-45 Olefin â­ Mica â­ Polysorbate 80 â­ Trimethoxycaprylylsilane â­ Hydrolyzed Wheat Gluten â­ Ethylhexylglycerin â­ Ceratonia Siliqua Gum â­ Triethoxycaprylylsilane â­ Phenoxyethanol â­ May Contain: Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

**Essence Stay All Day 16H Long-Lasting Make-Up 15** provides a smooth and silky complexion all day long. Its delicate texture allows for easy and even application. The high-quality pump dispenser ensures the perfect dosage for an indescribably beautiful look. This product is dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Stay All Day 16H Long-Lasting Make-Up 15**
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Essence Stay All Day 16H Long-Lasting Make-Up 15** to your skin.
â­ Distribute evenly using a sponge or makeup brush.
â­ Can be used alone or with another foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Stay All Day 16H Long-Lasting Make-Up 15**
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane

description_en:
**Essence The Eyebrow Pen 02** -  For those days when you need a little eyebrow help! No more leaving the house without perfectly shaped brows.  This new pen makes styling your eyebrows easy and fast. â­ The felt tip allows for precise application with intense color. â­ Long-lasting formula, easily removed with make-up remover. â­ Available in four shades: Blonde, Light Brown, Medium Brown, and Dark Brown. â­ Suitable for all skin types. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence The Eyebrow Pen 02**: â­ Start at the outer edge of the brow. â­ Brush across to the inner corner, against the hair growth. â­ Brush the brows in the other direction, shaping them into place. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence The Eyebrow Pen 02**: â­ Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Talc, Mica, Glyceryl Ricinoleate, Polyethylene, Hydrogenated Palm Oil, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Tocopherol, Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Sanitiser Resistant Nail Top Coat - Transparent**: Keep your perfect manicure for longer! With **Essence Sanitiser Resistant Nail Top Coat - Transparent**, say goodbye to dull and cracked nail polish caused by hand sanitizers. This innovative top coat features a formula that protects the color and shine of your nail polish, even with frequent use of disinfectants. Enjoy perfectly manicured nails and vibrant colors that last. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Sanitiser Resistant Nail Top Coat - Transparent**: 
â­ Apply one coat of **Essence Sanitiser Resistant Nail Top Coat - Transparent** over your nail polish after it has completely dried.
â­ Let it dry completely before touching anything.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Sanitiser Resistant Nail Top Coat - Transparent**: 
â­ Ethyl acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Acrylates copolymer
â­ Butyl acetate
â­ Acetyl tributyl citrate
â­ Isopropyl alcohol
â­ Dipropylene glycol dibenzoate
â­ CI 60725 (Violet 2)

description_en:
**Essence Studio Poreless & Skin Blurring Primer**, a smoothing primer with a soft-focus effect. Enriched with hyaluronic acid and coconut water for an even and almost poreless complexion. Makeup applies more evenly and lasts longer while keeping your skin hydrated. The perfect base for any makeup application. essence cosmetics are certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We do not test any of our products on animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Studio Poreless & Skin Blurring Primer**:
â­ Apply a thin, even layer to moisturized skin before makeup application.
â­ Allow setting for 30 seconds before applying foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Studio Poreless & Skin Blurring Primer**:
â­ Aqua (water), silica, polyethylene, glycerin, hdi/trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer, butylene glycol, sodium polyacrylate starch, squalane, tocopheryl acetate, sodium hyaluronate, pvp, polyacrylamide, hydroxyacetophenone, c13-14 isoparaffin, caprylyl glycol, 1,2-hexanediol, sodium phytate, laureth-7, galactoarabinan, parfum (fragrance), ci 77491 (iron oxides), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 57** gives you dreamy nails with its new and reformulated formula! â­ Long-lasting gel-like finish. â­ Excellent pigmentation and shine. â­ Wide range of colors, matte or glitter, to match the latest trends. â­ Ultra-fast drying. â­ Perfect for at-home use. â­ Creates a professional look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 57**:
â­ Clean your nails thoroughly before application. â­ Apply a thin coat of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 57**. â­ Allow to dry completely before applying another coat. â­ Use a top coat for extra shine and durability.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Shine Last & Go! Gel Nail Polish 57**:
â­ ETHYL ACETATE, BUTYL ACETATE, NITROCELLULOSE, ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER, ACETYL TRIBUTYL CITRATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE, POLYETHYLMETHACRYLATE, ZINC SULFATE, MANNITOL, ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, SILICA, N-BUTYL ALCOHOL, HEA IPDI ISOCYANURATE TRIMER/POLYCAPROLACTONE DIOL COPOLYMER, DIACETONE ALCOHOL, HEXANAL, TRIS-HEA IPDI ISOCYANURATE TRIMER, LITHOTHAMNION CALCAREUM EXTRACT, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, DIATOMACEOUS EARTH, ETOCRYLENE, PHOSPHORIC ACID, SORBIC ACID, CI 15850 (RED 6 LAKE), CI 19140 (YELLOW 5 LAKE), CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

**Essence Tiny Tip Precise Brow Pen 03**: Achieve perfectly defined and natural-looking brows with the **Essence Tiny Tip Precise Brow Pen 03**. This precise brow pen features a tiny tip for ultimate control, allowing you to effortlessly create both natural and dramatic brow looks. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Tiny Tip Precise Brow Pen 03**:
â­ Start by drawing a thin line along your natural brow shape.
â­ Gently fill in any gaps using small strokes.
â­ Use a brow brush to comb through the hairs and blend the color evenly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Tiny Tip Precise Brow Pen 03**:
â­AQUA (WATER)
â­ALCOHOL
â­GLYCERIN
â­PVP
â­PEG/PPG-14/4 DIMETHICONE
â­PROPYLENE GLYCOL
â­PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE
â­CI 16255 (RED 40)
â­CI 42090 (BLUE 1)

description_en:
**Essence Sawasdee Bangkok Eyeshadow Palette 05**, Welcome to Bangkok! Inspired by the vibrant metropolis, this palette features nine eyeshadow shades in exciting reddish and soft brown hues, with matte, shimmer, and metallic finishes. Enjoy high pigmentation for creating unique looks. Its high-quality packaging with a mirror makes it perfect for on-the-go use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Sawasdee Bangkok Eyeshadow Palette 05**:
â­ Decide on your look.
â­ Pick your lid shade.
â­ Apply shadow to your lashes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Sawasdee Bangkok Eyeshadow Palette 05**:
â­ Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides
â­ Talc
â­ Mica
â­ Glyceryl Ricinoleate
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Hydrogenated Palm Oil
â­ Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax)
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides)
â­ Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides)
â­ Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)
â­ Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Contouring Duo Palette 20** - Contouring is absolutely essential for a perfect make-up look. The contouring duo palette makes it easier than ever. Two matt shades in two nuances are suitable for different skin tones and can be easily blended thanks to the soft texture. The contouring powders can be applied individually with a make-up brush or mixed for an expressive look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Contouring Duo Palette 20**:
â­ Apply the matte contour powder in areas such as the hollows of your cheeks, temples, hairline, jawline or nose.
â­ Then apply the highlighter on the cheek & brow bones, nose and chin for a perfect contoured look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Contouring Duo Palette 20**:
â­ Matte Contour Powder
â­ Highlighter

â­ Store in a cool and dry place.
â­ Protect from direct heat and sunlight.

description_en:
**Essence Out In The Wild Eyeshadow Palette 01** â€“ Get wild with 12 highly pigmented shades!  This palette ranges from gorgeous rosy tones to earthy shades, with both matte and metallic textures, perfect for creating bold eye looks. **Essence Out In The Wild Eyeshadow Palette 01** is PETA-certified and cruelty-free. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Out In The Wild Eyeshadow Palette 01**: 
â­ Use your favorite eyeshadow brush to seamlessly blend the shadows across your eyelid.
â­ Use darker shades in the crease, and lighter shades along your brow bone and inner corners.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Out In The Wild Eyeshadow Palette 01**: 
â­ Talc, mica, magnesium stearate, silica, dimethicone, hydrogenated polyisobutene, polybutene, bis-diglyceryl polyacyladipate-2, tocopheryl acetate, ethylhexylglycerin, phenoxyethanol, may contain/[+/-]: ci 16035 (red 40 lake), ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77742 (manganese violet), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 07**: Get dreamy nails with the new and reformulated **Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 07**!  The gel-like formula provides perfect coverage and a brilliant shine. This range includes both matte and shiny shades to create incredible manicure designs based on the latest trends. Achieve a beautiful manicure at home quickly and easily with **Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 07**, which boasts a super-fast drying formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 07**:
â­ Apply a thin layer of nail polish to clean, dry nails.
â­ Allow to dry for two minutes before applying a second coat.
â­ Use a top coat for extra shine and durability.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Clean & Strong Nail Polish 07**:
â­ ETHYL ACETATE
â­ BUTYL ACETATE
â­ NITROCELLULOSE
â­ ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER
â­ ALCOHOL
â­ TRIETHYL CITRATE
â­ STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE
â­ DIACETONE ALCOHOL
â­ MALTOL
â­ ACTINIDIA CHINENSIS (KIWI) FRUIT EXTRACT
â­ PISTACIA LENTISCUS (MASTIC) GUM
â­ TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE
â­ PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAISOSTEARATE
â­ MICROCRYSTALLINE CELLULOSE
â­ MAGNESIUM STEARATE
â­ SILICA
â­ ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE
â­ PHOSPHORIC ACID
â­ POTASSIUM SORBATE
â­ CI 15850 (RED 7 LAKE)
â­ CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES)
â­ CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES)
â­ CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

â­ Apply two coats over a base coat for a long-lasting manicure without UV light.

â­ Aqua (Water) â­ Cyclopentasiloxane â­ Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone â­ Dimethiconol â­ Cyclohexasiloxane â­ Sodium Chloride â­ C30-45 Alkyl Methicone â­ C30-45 Olefin â­ Mica â­ Polysorbate 80 â­ Trimethoxycaprylylsilane â­ Hydrolyzed Wheat Gluten â­ Ethylhexylglycerin â­ Ceratonia Siliqua Gum â­ Triethoxycaprylylsilane â­ Phenoxyethanol. **Essence This Is Me. Lipstick 06 - Nude**, the search for the perfect nude lipstick is over!  **Essence This Is Me. Lipstick 06 - Nude** features 20 flattering nude shades to suit all skin tones. Its semi-matte texture feels light, is long-lasting, and offers high coverage.  Pair it with matching nail polishes for a complete look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence This Is Me. Lipstick 06 - Nude**:
â­ Apply color starting from the center of the upper lip outwards.
â­ Repeat on the lower lip.
â­ Use your finger to evenly distribute the color.

**Essence Contouring Duo Palette 10** - Contouring is absolutely essential for a perfect make-up look. This contouring duo palette makes it easier than ever. Two matte shades in two nuances are suitable for different skin tones and can be easily blended thanks to the soft texture. The contouring powders can be applied individually with a make-up brush or mixed for an expressive look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Contouring Duo Palette 10**:
â­ Apply the matte contour powder in areas such as the hollows of your cheeks, temples, hairline, jawline or nose.
â­ Then apply the highlighter on the cheek & brow bones, nose and chin for a perfect contoured look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Contouring Duo Palette 10**:
â­ Soft texture contour powders.
â­ Soft texture highlighter.

description_en:
**Essence Get Big! Lashes Volume Boost Mascara - Black**: Get big volume and amazing density with **Essence Get Big! Lashes Volume Boost Mascara - Black**. This mascara features a mega football-shaped brush that reaches even the tiniest lashes, coating each one without clumping or weighing them down. Achieve a breathtaking look easily and quickly! Ophthalmologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Get Big! Lashes Volume Boost Mascara - Black**:
â­ Start at the base of the lash line.
â­ Wiggle the wand back and forth.
â­ Add as many coats as desired to achieve your desired length and volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Get Big! Lashes Volume Boost Mascara - Black**:
â­ aqua (water)
â­ cera alba (beeswax)
â­ nylon-12
â­ euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax
â­ glyceryl stearate
â­ decyl olivate
â­ hydrogenated olive oil stearyl esters
â­ stearic acid
â­ copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax
â­ palmitic acid
â­ tocopherol
â­ pvp
â­ hydroxyethylcellulose
â­ polyquaternium-10
â­ allantoin
â­ ethylhexylglycerin
â­ tbhq
â­ tetrasodium edta
â­ sodium nitrate
â­ aminomethyl propanol
â­ sodium hydroxide
â­ phenoxyethanol
â­ potassium sorbate
â­ ci 77499 (iron oxides).

description_en:
**Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 43**: Achieve a flawless, natural matte complexion with this perfect powder. Its delicate, powdery texture blends seamlessly for a professional, airbrushed finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 43**:
â­ Dip the included brush in the powder, ensuring bristles are evenly coated.
â­ Apply to your T-zone (forehead and nose) first, then under eyes, cheeks, and along jawline.
â­ Gently blend for an even, seamless coverage.
â­ Reapply every few hours as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 43**:
â­ Talc
â­ Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­ Sapphire Powder
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Magnesium Stearate

â­ Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Hexylene Glycol
â­ Phenoxyethanol

â­ Polybutene

description_en:
**Essence Jurassic World I Love Extreme Crazy Volume Mascara** is a must-have beauty essential from the limited Jurassic World Trend Edition. It comes in a shimmering rose gold container featuring dinosaur details.  The extra-large plastic brush coats each lash in deep black, giving your lashes spectacular volume.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Jurassic World I Love Extreme Crazy Volume Mascara**:
â­ Apply the wand at the base of your upper lashes, wiggling it back and forth to coat the base.
â­ Pull the wand upwards towards the tips of your eyelashes, making sure to coat each lash slowly to avoid clumping.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Jurassic World I Love Extreme Crazy Volume Mascara**:
â­ AQUA (WATER)
â­ PARAFFIN
â­ GLYCERYL STEARATE
â­ SYNTHETIC BEESWAX
â­ STEARIC ACID
â­ BUTYLENE GLYCOL
â­ ACACIA SENEGAL GUM
â­ PALMITIC ACID
â­ ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN WAX
â­ POLYBUTENE
â­ VP/EICOSENE COPOLYMER
â­ AMINOMETHYL PROPANEDIOL
â­ OZOKERITE
â­ TROPOLONE
â­ HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL
â­ STEARYL STEARATE
â­ HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL
â­ CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES).

description_en:
**Essence Out In The Wild Eyeshadow Palette 02** - Unleash your inner wild child! Explore 12 highly pigmented, wearable shades. This palette features gorgeous rosy and earthy tones, with a mix of matte and metallic textures to create bold and expressive eye looks.  **Essence Out In The Wild Eyeshadow Palette 02** is cruelty-free and PETA-approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Out In The Wild Eyeshadow Palette 02**:
â­ Use your favorite eyeshadow brush to seamlessly blend the shadows across your eyelid.
â­ Apply darker shades to the crease, and lighter shades along the brow bone and inner corners of the eye.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Out In The Wild Eyeshadow Palette 02**:
â­ Talc, mica, magnesium stearate, silica, dimethicone, hydrogenated polyisobutene, polybutene, bis-diglyceryl polyacyladipate-2, tocopheryl acetate, ethylhexylglycerin, phenoxyethanol, may contain/[+/-]: ci 16035 (red 40 lake), ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77742 (manganese violet), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence I Like To Mauve It Eyeshadow Palette**: Your favorite songs just got a little more colorful! Mix and match 6 highly pigmented wearable shades to create stunning eye looks suitable for any song and dance. The gorgeous mauve tones range from matte to shimmery textures, the perfect combination so you never miss a beat! essence cosmetics are certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We do not test any of our products on animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence I Like To Mauve It Eyeshadow Palette**:
â­ Use your favorite eyeshadow brush.
â­ Blend shadows seamlessly across your eyelid.
â­ Use darker shades in the crease, and lighter contours along the brow bone and inner corners of the eye.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence I Like To Mauve It Eyeshadow Palette**:
â­ Talc, mica, silica, magnesium stearate, dimethicone, hydrogenated polyisobutene, polybutene, bis-diglyceryl polyacyladipate-2, tocopheryl acetate, ethylhexylglycerin, phenoxyethanol, parfum (fragrance), benzyl alcohol, benzyl benzoate, benzyl salicylate, hexyl cinnamal, hydroxycitronellal, may contain/[+/-]: ci 77007 (ultramarines), ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77742 (manganese violet), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Multi-Action & Protecting Primer**: This multi-benefit primer protects your skin from harmful sun rays and blue light. â­ Contains a mineral UV filter with SPF 15, without leaving a white cast. â­ Reduces skin stress caused by blue light. â­ Lightweight texture, free of alcohol and fragrances, quickly absorbed, and non-greasy. â­ Wear it alone as a day cream with SPF, or under foundation. â­ Gives skin a smooth, blurred effect. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Multi-Action & Protecting Primer**: 
â­ Apply a thin, even layer to moisturized skin before makeup application. 
â­ Allow to set for 30 seconds before applying foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Multi-Action & Protecting Primer**: 
â­Aqua (water), c12-15 alkyl benzoate, isododecane, titanium dioxide (nano), dimethicone, silica, peg-10 dimethicone, propanediol, betaine, glycerin, aluminum stearate, tocopheryl acetate, daucus carota sativa (carrot) seed oil, canola oil, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, disteardimonium hectorite, sodium chloride, polyhydroxystearic acid, silica dimethyl silylate, polyglyceryl-4 isostearate, cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone, hexyl laurate, propylene carbonate, ethylhexylglycerin, beta-carotene, daucus carota sativa (carrot) root extract, alumina, phenoxyethanol.

#primer #essence #makeup #beauty #skincare #sunprotection #spf #riyadh #jeddah #saudiarabia

description_en:
The new **Essence Lash Princess Curl & Volume Mascara** for intense volume and curl!  Its peanut-shaped brush allows for easy application, giving you both volume and curl â€“ 2 must-have mascara effects in one! â­ Easy to apply. â­ Provides amazing volume. â­ Creates perfect curl. â­ Enriched formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Lash Princess Curl & Volume Mascara**: 
â­ Starting at the base of the lash line, wiggle the wand back and forth, adding as many coats as you like until desired length and volume is achieved. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Lash Princess Curl & Volume Mascara**: 
â­ Aqua (water), rhus verniciflua peel cera (rhus verniciflua peel wax), glyceryl stearate se, butylene glycol, acacia senegal gum, oryza sativa (rice) bran wax, palmitic acid, stearic acid, aminomethyl propanol, vp/eicosene copolymer, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond) oil, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, tocopherol, copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax, shorea robusta resin, hydroxyethylcellulose, tocopheryl acetate, trimethyl pentanyl diisobutyrate, ethylhexylglycerin, sodium nitrate, disodium phosphate, sodium phosphate, polysorbate 60, phenoxyethanol, potassium sorbate, sodium dehydroacetate, ci 77499 (iron oxides).

description_en:
**Essence Electric Glow** Colour Changing Lip & Cheek Oil 4.4 ml: A soft shimmer of color for lips and cheeks â€“ with just one product! Its texture reacts to your skin's pH and changes color, creating a natural glow and fresh look. Enriched with nourishing peach kernel oil, and free of silicones, parabens, mineral oil, microplastic particles, and gluten.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Electric Glow**: 
â­ Blend with fingertips onto natural skin.
â­ Apply to lips alone or over lipstick.
â­ Dab onto cheeks for a soft wash of blush.
â­ Layer to intensify color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Electric Glow**: 
â­ Isononyl Isononanoate
â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate
â­ Prunus Persica (Peach) Kernel Oil
â­ Glycerin
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate

â­ Parfum (Fragrance)

â­ Citronellol

description_en:
**Essence Baby Got Bronze Stick** gives you a natural-looking sun-kissed glow!  The **Essence Baby Got Bronze Stick** boasts a soft, creamy texture that's easy to apply and blend for a summery tan. The **Essence Baby Got Bronze Stick** is designed to fit into any handbag, making it perfect for on-the-go application. Available in three shades. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Baby Got Bronze Stick**: 
â­ Swipe the stick across cheekbones, forehead, nose, and chin. 
â­ Gently blend the color using a makeup brush or your finger. 
â­ Apply to eyelids and lips for a beachy look. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Baby Got Bronze Stick**: 
â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Octyldodecanol, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Calcium Carbonate, Kaolin, Isostearyl Alcohol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Parfum (Fragrance), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499, CI 77891. 

#Essence #BabyGotBronze #Bronzer #Makeup #Beauty #MakeUp #Summer #SunKissed #Glow #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 15** for a naturally flawless look! This lightweight and smooth foundation provides medium coverage, easily blends, and allows your skin to breathe, perfect for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 15**:
â­ Use your favorite foundation brush or sponge.
â­ Apply **Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 15** evenly to your face.
â­ Add more product where needed for extra coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 15**:
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Isododecane
â­ Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­ Cetyl Diglyceryl Tris(Trimethylsiloxy)Silylethyl Dimethicone
â­ Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Silica
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Calcium Carbonate
â­ Mica
â­ C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Stearyl Dimethicone
â­ Disteardimonium Hectorite
â­ Methicone
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Octadecene
â­ Propylene Carbonate
â­ Hexadecene
â­ Talc
â­ Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides)
â­ Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides)
â­ Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)
â­ Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 13** delivers a naturally flawless look with its velvety texture. This lightweight and smooth formula provides medium coverage, concealing imperfections without clogging pores. Easy to apply and blend seamlessly, it leaves your skin looking fresh and natural all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 13**:
â­ Use your favorite makeup brush or sponge.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 13** evenly to your face.
â­ Blend well for even coverage.
â­ Add more product as needed to cover specific areas.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 13**:
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Isododecane
â­ Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­ and other natural skin-friendly ingredients.

**Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 04** offers a lightweight and easy-to-use formula for a naturally flawless look. Get medium coverage with a comfortable texture that lets your skin breathe.  It evens out imperfections for a radiant, smooth complexion. Perfect for everyday wear!

â­ Use your favorite foundation brush or sponge.

â­ Build coverage as needed.

description_en:
**Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 01** offers a lightweight, easy-to-blend formula for a naturally flawless finish. This medium coverage foundation evens out skin tone while allowing your skin to breathe. Its vegan formula is free of alcohol, gluten, parabens, and fragrance, making it gentle on the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 01**:
â­ Apply the desired amount to your skin using a brush or sponge.
â­ Blend evenly all over your face for an even coverage.
â­ Build coverage as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Natural Matte Mousse Foundation 01**:
â­Dimethicone
â­Isododecane
â­Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­Cetyl Diglyceryl Tris(Trimethylsiloxy)Silylethyl Dimethicone
â­Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­Silica
â­Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­Calcium Carbonate
â­Mica
â­C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone
â­Tocopherol

â­Disteardimonium Hectorite
â­Methicone
â­Ethylhexylglycerin
â­Octadecene

â­Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

**Essence Brow Lifting Gel Set 12 gm** guarantees an expressive brow look. This transparent gel suits all hair colors and provides long-lasting results comparable to a professional brow lift. It comes with a fine brush for shaping even the finest hairs.

description_en:
**Eucerin Lotion Complete Repair 10% Urea 250 ml** provides intense, long-lasting moisturization for very dry, rough skin. This lotion relieves dryness and roughness, leaving your skin feeling smooth and supple.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Lotion Complete Repair 10% Urea 250 ml**:
â­ Gently massage the lotion into your skin until completely absorbed.
â­ Apply as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Lotion Complete Repair 10% Urea 250 ml**:
â­ Urea
â­ Ceramide 3
â­ Natural Moisturizing Factors (NMFs)

**Eucerin Lotion Complete Repair 10% Urea 250 ml** features a unique combination of Urea, Ceramide and NMFs, providing immediate relief and intense, long-lasting moisturization for up to 48 hours. Suitable for all types of dry skin, including mature skin, and those with diabetes, psoriasis, and keratosis pilaris. Fragrance-free, non-comedogenic, fast-absorbing, and non-greasy.

description_en:
**Eucerin Sun Oil Control Dry Touch SPF 50+ 50 ml** is an advanced facial sunscreen specially formulated for oily and acne-prone skin. It provides very high protection against harmful UV rays with a lightweight, non-greasy formula. It absorbs quickly, leaving your skin feeling soft and refreshed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Sun Oil Control Dry Touch SPF 50+ 50 ml**:
â­ Apply in the morning after, or instead of, your regular day cream.
â­ Particularly recommended if you are using acne medication or a skin peeling product, as both can make skin more sensitive to the sun.
â­ Can be used with other Eucerin facial care products.
â­ Your skin is instantly protected from the sun â€“ no waiting time required.
â­ Follow with make-up if appropriate.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Sun Oil Control Dry Touch SPF 50+ 50 ml**:
â­ Advanced Spectral Technology
â­ Superior broadband and photostable UVA/UVB filters
â­ Glycyrrhetinic Acid
â­ Oil Control Technology

title_ar: **ÙŠÙˆØ³Ø±ÙŠÙ† ÙˆØ§Ù‚ÙŠ Ø´Ù…Ø³ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ù…ÙØªØ­ Ù…Ø¹ Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ù„ Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© SPF 50+ 50 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Eucerin Sun Fluid Pigment Control SPF 50+ 50ml** is an everyday facial sunscreen for all skin types that helps prevent sun-induced hyperpigmentation.  It combines broadband and photostable UVA/UVB filters for very high UV protection with Licochalcone A to neutralize free radicals caused by UV and HEVIS light. It also includes Glycyrrhetinic Acid, which supports the skin's own DNA repair mechanism. The formula is enriched with Thiamidol, an effective and patented ingredient that targets the root cause of hyperpigmentation. It visibly reduces dark spots over time and, when used regularly, prevents their re-appearance. **Eucerin Sun Fluid Pigment Control SPF 50+ 50ml** has a light texture that absorbs quickly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Sun Fluid Pigment Control SPF 50+ 50ml**: 
â­ Apply in the morning after, or instead of, your regular day care product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Sun Fluid Pigment Control SPF 50+ 50ml**: 
â­ Broadband and photostable UVA/UVB filters
â­ Licochalcone A
â­ Glycyrrhetinic Acid
â­ Thiamidol

#Sunscreen #Eucerin #SunProtection #SPF50 #HealthySkin #Skincare #Beauty #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia #KSA

**Eucerin Dermo Purifyer Toner 200 ml** is a powerful toner that deeply cleanses the skin and removes impurities. It's specially formulated for oily, acne-prone skin with enlarged pores. It helps regulate sebum production, reduces the appearance of blemishes, and leaves your skin looking radiant and refreshed. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Dermo Purifyer Toner**: 
â­ Use morning and evening after cleansing.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to a clean cotton pad.
â­ Gently wipe your face, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Do not rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Dermo Purifyer Toner**: 
â­ Lactic Acid
â­ Other effective skin-clarifying ingredients

Shows noticeable results within two weeks with regular use. Tested on South African skin.

**Eucerin Hyaluron Filler Elasticity Night Cream 50ml** is an anti-aging night cream that fills deep wrinkles and improves skin elasticity. Its unique formula offers multiple anti-aging benefits. â­ Visibly reduces deep wrinkles. â­ Improves skin elasticity. â­ Leaves skin looking radiant and refreshed. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Hyaluron Filler Elasticity Night Cream 50ml**: 
â­ Apply in the evening to a well-cleansing face, neck, and dÃ©colletÃ©. â­ Gently massage into the skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Hyaluron Filler Elasticity Night Cream 50ml**: 
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Methylpropanediol, Argan Oil, Hydrogenated Coconut Glycerides, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Silymarin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin + D9, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Glycine.

description_en:
**Eucerin Aquaphor Soothing Skin Balm 45 gm** provides SOS care for dry, cracked, and irritated skin. â­ Accelerates skin regeneration. â­ Clinically proven to repair dry to very dry, cracked, or irritated skin. â­ Gentle enough for use on babies. â­ Fragrance-free. â­ Preservative-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Aquaphor Soothing Skin Balm 45 gm**: 
â­ Apply as frequently as needed to affected areas. â­ A small fingertip of product is normally enough for both your hands. â­ A medium fingertip of product is about right for problem areas on babyâ€™s skin and a slightly larger amount is ideal for each of your feet. â­ Massage into your skin using your fingertips. â­ The ointment spreads easily as it warms. â­ Do not use on open, bleeding, or wet wounds. â­ Wait until skin has re-epithelialized before using the product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Aquaphor Soothing Skin Balm 45 gm**: Please refer to packaging for a full ingredient list.

title_ar: **ÙŠÙˆØ³Ø±ÙŠÙ† ÙÙŠÙ„Ø± Ù‡Ù„ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ† Ù…Ù‚Ø´Ø± Ù„ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ùˆ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… 30 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Eucerin Hyaluron Filler Night Peeling & Serum 30 ml**, a dual-efficacy anti-aging peeling and moisturizing serum for all skin types. It refines skin texture, promotes skin cell renewal, plumps up even the deepest wrinkles, and leaves skin smoother, more radiant, and with visibly refined pores. It features a light, pleasant fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Hyaluron Filler Night Peeling & Serum 30 ml**:
â­ Apply once a day, in the evening, to a well-cleansed face, neck, and dÃ©colletÃ©.
â­ Press the top of the dispenser in the middle to release the optimum combination of both formulas.
â­ Mix the two formulas together in the palm of your hand.
â­ Avoid direct contact with your eyes.
â­ The product may increase skin's sensitivity to the sun, so ensure you use at least an SPF 30 sunscreen daily after use and for a week after.
â­ For best results, use with other products from the Eucerin Hyaluron-Filler range.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Hyaluron Filler Night Peeling & Serum 30 ml**:
â­ AHA Complex
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Glycine Saponin

description_en:
**Eucerin Even Pigment Perfector Illuminating Eye Care 15ml** is a luxurious eye cream designed to brighten the eye area and reduce hyperpigmentation. â­It contains patented Thiamidol, which works to reduce melanin production. â­Provides an instantly fresh and awake look thanks to light-reflecting pigments. â­Easy and precise application to small areas of hyperpigmentation. â­Features a cooling metal applicator for optimal performance. â­Visible results in just two weeks, with skin appearing smoother, more even, and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Even Pigment Perfector Illuminating Eye Care 15ml**: 
â­Apply a pea-sized amount to the metal applicator. 
â­Gently massage above and below the eye in circular motions. 
â­Pat gently until fully absorbed. 
â­Maximum 4 applications of all face products with Thiamidol per day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Even Pigment Perfector Illuminating Eye Care 15ml**: 
â­Thiamidol 
â­Light-reflecting pigments 
â­Oligopeptide

title_ar: **ÙŠÙˆØ³Ø±ÙŠÙ† ÙˆØ§Ù‚ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ù…Ø³ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… ØºÙŠØ± Ù…Ø¹Ø·Ø± 50 Ù…Ù„ (1+1)**
description_en:
**Eucerin Sun Protection Cream Fragrance Free 50 ml (1+1)** is a daily facial sunscreen that protects and soothes sensitive and dry skin. â­ Provides superior UVA/UVB protection with photostable broad-spectrum filters. â­ Protects against harmful sun damage. â­ Contains Licochalcone A to neutralize free radicals caused by UV and HEVIS light. â­ Contains Glycyrrhetinic Acid to support skin's DNA repair mechanism. â­ Lightweight and creamy texture. â­ Suitable for sensitive and even atopic skin. â­ Fragrance-free. â­ Water resistant. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Sun Protection Cream Fragrance Free 50 ml (1+1)**:
â­ Apply in the morning after, or instead of, your regular day care product. â­ Provides instant sun protectionâ€”no waiting time required. â­ Can be used under makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Sun Protection Cream Fragrance Free 50 ml (1+1)**:
â­ Licochalcone A: Antioxidant that protects against free radicals and reduces redness. â­ Glycyrrhetinic Acid: Antioxidant that repairs skin DNA. â­ UVA/UVB filters to protect against sunburn.

#Eucerin #Sunscreen #SunProtection #SensitiveSkin #SunCream #SPF50 #Beauty #Skincare #SkinHealth #EucerinProducts

description_en:
**Eucerin Sun Fluid Anti-Age Spf50 50ml 1+1** is an everyday facial sunscreen that helps prevent photoaging and visibly reduces wrinkles. â­ It combines broadband and photostable UVA and UVB filters for high UV protection. â­  It contains Licochalcone A to neutralize free radicals caused by UV and HEVIS light. â­ It also includes Glycyrrhetinic Acid which supports the skinâ€™s own DNA repair mechanism. â­ Enriched with short- and long-chained Hyaluronic Acid, it visibly reduces wrinkles on the face and dÃ©colletÃ©. â­ It has a light texture that absorbs quickly. â­ Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin. â­ Itâ€™s fragrance-free, paraben-free, and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Sun Fluid Anti-Age Spf50 50ml 1+1**:
â­ Apply generously before sun exposure. â­ Reapply frequently, especially after swimming, perspiring, or toweling, to maintain protection. â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Sun Fluid Anti-Age Spf50 50ml 1+1**:
â­ Aqua. â­ Homosalate. â­ Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane. â­ Ethylhexyl Salicylate. â­ Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate. â­ Ethylhexyl Triazone. â­ Alcohol Denat. â­ Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine.

description_en:
**Eucerin Scrub Dermopurifye Oil Free 100ml** is an oil-free scrub for oily, blemish-prone skin. â­ Reduces impurities and blackheads. â­ Gently cleanses and refines skin texture. â­ With Lactic Acid and micro-particles to unclog pores. â­ Prevents the build-up of impurities. â­ Suitable for face and body. â­ For noticeably smoother skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Scrub Dermopurifye Oil Free 100ml**:
â­ Use the scrub once a week, or more frequently if needed, instead of the cleansing gel.
â­ Wet your face and/or body.
â­ Apply product to your hands (use an amount about the size of a hazelnut).
â­ Gently massage onto face and/or body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Follow with the appropriate care product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Scrub Dermopurifye Oil Free 100ml**:
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ Micro-particles.
â­ Other ingredients that cleanse and soothe the skin.

description_en:
**Eucerin Sun Hydro Protect Spf50 50ml** is a daily facial sunscreen designed to provide immediate moisturization and a fresh feeling while offering high protection against sun damage. It combines broad-spectrum and photostable UVA and UVB filters to provide very high protection against UV rays, along with Licochalcone A to neutralize free radicals caused by UV radiation. It also contains Glycyrrhetinic Acid that supports the skinâ€™s own DNA repair mechanism.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Sun Hydro Protect Spf50 50ml**:
â­ Apply a sufficient amount to your face in the morning, after or instead of your day cream.
â­ Your skin is immediately protected, no waiting time.
â­ Makeup can be applied afterwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Sun Hydro Protect Spf50 50ml**:
â­ Aqua, Homosalate, Octocrylene, Glycerin, Denat. Alcohol, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Ethylhexyl Cocoate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycyrrhetinic Acid, Glycyrrhiza Inflata Root Extract, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Dimethicone, Sodium Hydroxide, Trisodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol.

description_en:
**Eucerin Atopicontrol Body Care Lotion 250 ml** is a daily-use body lotion specially formulated to soothe and intensely moisturize irritated and itchy skin.  Itâ€™s enriched with concentrated Omega 6 fatty acids (Evening Primrose and Grape Seed Oil) and soothing Licochalcone A (from liquorice root) to help replenish the skin, support its natural barrier function and improve its elasticity. Apply once or twice daily, or as additional care alongside **Eucerin AtopiControl Acute Care Cream** during flare-ups. With regular use, itching and tightness are reduced, and skin feels noticeably softer and smoother. Clinically and dermatologically proven to be compatible with atopic skin in adults, children and babies from 3 months. This water-in-oil formulation is fragrance-free, colorant-free and paraben-free to minimize the risk of irritation and allergies.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Atopicontrol Body Care Lotion 250 ml**
â­ Apply once or twice daily, or as needed.
â­ For best results, use in combination with Eucerin AtopiControl Bath and Shower Oil.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Atopicontrol Body Care Lotion 250 ml**
â­ Evening Primrose Oil
â­ Grape Seed Oil
â­ Licochalcone A

description_en:
**Eucerin Dermopurifyer Protective UV Fluid SPF 30** is the ideal solution for fighting acne and its aftermath. Many suffer from post-acne marks which can be even more distressing than acne itself.  **Eucerin Dermopurifyer Protective UV Fluid SPF 30** helps prevent blemishes and hyperpigmentation thanks to its unique formula:

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Dermopurifyer Protective UV Fluid SPF 30**
â­ Apply in the morning or as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Dermopurifyer Protective UV Fluid SPF 30**
â­ SPF 30 UVA/UVB filters to protect against sun damage.
â­ Antibacterial Decanediol to help prevent blemishes.
â­ Anti-oxidant Licochalcone A to soothe irritations.
â­ Sebum Regulating Technology for a long-lasting, dry matt finish.

â­ Clinically proven, when used with Eucerin DermoPure Triple Effect Serum, to visibly prevent post-acne marks, reduce blemishes by up to 90%, and visibly improve pores by up to 71%. First visible results in 2 weeks.

#Eucerin #Dermopurifyer #Sunscreen #HealthySkin #Skincare #Acne #PostAcneMarks #ClearSkin #Beauty #SkincareRoutine

description_en:
**Eucerin Dermopurifyer Foaming Cleanser 150 Ml** is a gentle yet effective daily face wash specifically designed for oily, acne-prone skin.  Containing 6% Ampho-Tensides, it helps remove dirt, makeup, and excess oil gently without over-drying. Its soap- and fragrance-free formula prevents clogged pores. Thanks to its antibacterial properties, it helps prevent the growth of acne-causing bacteria. It can be used alongside medical acne treatments, and during pregnancy. Dermatologist-tested, it proves effective in cleansing oily skin without irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Dermopurifyer Foaming Cleanser 150 Ml**
â­ Use a cherry-sized amount.
â­ Work into a lather in your hands with a little water.
â­ Gently massage into your face using circular motions.
â­ Rinse with lukewarm water.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Dermopurifyer Foaming Cleanser 150 Ml**
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Cocoamphoacetate
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ Sebum Regulating Technology

#Eucerin #FoamingCleanser #OilySkin #Acne #SkinCare #Beauty #SkinHealth #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia #SkincareRoutine
