**Eucerin Atopicontrol Bath & Shower Oil 400 ml** is a gentle daily cleanser for skin with Atopic Dermatitis. â­ Gently cleanses and soothes dry and irritated atopic skin. â­ Relieves itching and prevents further dryness. â­ Suitable for adults, children, and babies (3 months+). â­ Fragrance-free, soap-free, and contains no parabens or colorants.  â­ High concentration of Omega-3 and Omega-6 oils. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Atopicontrol Bath & Shower Oil 400 ml**: â­ Apply **Eucerin Atopicontrol Bath & Shower Oil 400 ml** to wet skin. â­ Lather gently and rinse thoroughly. â­ Pat skin dry with a towel without rubbing. â­ Use as a bath additive for babies.

**Eucerin Urea Repair Body Wash Fluid 400 ml** is a gentle, replenishing, and effective body cleanser for very dry, rough skin. It can be used daily without stripping the skin's natural protective barrier. It's enriched with moisturizing Urea and other NMFs to prevent skin dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Urea Repair Body Wash Fluid 400 ml**: 
â­ Apply a small amount to the skin.
â­ Gently massage into a lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use with Eucerin UreaRepair PLUS products for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Urea Repair Body Wash Fluid 400 ml**:
â­ Urea

**Eucerin Micellar Cleansing Fluid 3 In 1 200 ml** is a refreshing, cleansing solution that removes all water-soluble eye and face make-up. It's quick and convenient to use and has been tested on, and proven to be compatible with, sensitive skin and eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Micellar Cleansing Fluid 3 In 1 200 ml**:
â­ Apply to a cotton wool pad and gently wipe over eyes, face, and neck.
â­ Repeat until the pad is clean.
â­ Use morning and evening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Micellar Cleansing Fluid 3 In 1 200 ml**:
â­ APG Complex: an effective yet extra mild cleansing complex.
â­ Gluco-glycerol: a nature-derived moisturizing active.
â­ Hyaluronic acid: skin care active with a high moisture binding capacity.

**Eucerin Sun Protection Fluid Fragrance Free 50 ml (1+1)**:  Experience superior sun protection with this fragrance-free fluid, perfect for sensitive, oily, and combination skin.  Enjoy a lightweight, non-greasy formula that leaves no shiny residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Sun Protection Fluid Fragrance Free 50 ml (1+1)**:
â­ Apply generously before sun exposure.

â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Sun Protection Fluid Fragrance Free 50 ml (1+1)**:
â­ Advanced UVA/UVB filters for superior protection.
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy formula.
â­ Fragrance-free.

description_en:
**Eucerin Dermopurifyer Kit** is a complete skincare kit for blemish and acne-prone skin. It contains a gentle yet effective cleansing gel and a toner that purifies the skin and prepares it for subsequent care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eucerin Dermopurifyer Kit**:
â­ Use the cleansing gel twice daily, morning and evening.
â­ Apply a cherry-sized amount to your hand and gently work into a lather.
â­ Gently massage onto your face, then rinse with lukewarm water.
â­ Use the toner morning and evening after cleansing and before moisturizing.
â­ Apply the toner to a cotton pad and wipe your face.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eucerin Dermopurifyer Kit**:
â­ Cleansing Gel: Contains 6% Ampho-Tensides for gentle and effective cleansing.
â­ Toner: Contains 2% Lactic Acid to purify pores and prevent bacterial growth.

#Eucerin #Dermopurifyer #Skincare #Acne #HealthySkin #Beauty #ClearSkin #SkincareRoutine #SkinHealth #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Purifying Charcoal Nose Strip 4pcs** provides a deep cleansing solution for blackheads and clogged pores.  These strips contain activated charcoal and silica, which have antibacterial and oil-absorbing properties. They leave your skin feeling smooth, refreshed, and flawless.

â­ Deep pore cleansing.
â­ Removes blackheads and whiteheads.
â­ Soothes inflammation and redness.
â­ Enriched with natural extracts like green tea, witch hazel, aloe vera, and Vitamin E.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Purifying Charcoal Nose Strip 4pcs**:
â­ Thoroughly cleanse your face and wet your nose with water.
â­ Peel off the strip and apply it to your nose, pressing down firmly.
â­ Leave it on for 10-15 minutes.
â­ Carefully peel off the strip from the edges to the center.
â­ Rinse off any residue with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Purifying Charcoal Nose Strip 4pcs**:
â­ Alcohol Denat., Vinyl Caprolactam/VP/Dimethylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Silica, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Aqua (Water), Charcoal Powder, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Hamamelis Virginiana Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, CI 77499 (Iron Oxide), Parfum (Fragrance), Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool.

description_en:
**Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Toner 200ml** is a gentle yet effective toner for acne-prone skin. It regulates sebum production, tightens pores, and helps restore the natural balance of oily and problematic skin. It removes excess oil, dirt, and makeup residue, leaving skin clean and refreshed. Its antibacterial and anti-inflammatory formula contains natural ingredients such as shikimic acid, mandelic acid, tea tree extract, and burdock, along with zinc, copper, and sulfur. These ingredients work together to fight skin inflammation, reduce redness and inflammation, prevent scarring, and smooth skin texture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Toner 200ml**:
â­ Apply the toner to cleansed and dry skin, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Use twice a day, morning and evening, or as needed.
â­ Follow with a suitable moisturizer or serum.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Toner 200ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Phenoxyethanol, Shikimic Acid, Mandelic Acid, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Zinc Pca, Copper Pca, Sulfur, Propylene Glycol, Betula Alba Bark/Leaf Extract, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Salix Alba Bark Extract, Juniperus Oxycedrus Wood Oil.

#EvelineToner #Skincare #AcneTreatment #HealthySkin #BeautySkin #SkincareProducts #SkincareRoutine #CleanSkin #NaturalIngredients #SuitableSkincare

description_en:
**Eveline Serum Shot 5% Caffeine Puffiness Reduction 30ml** is a powerful serum for revitalizing tired and dull eyes. It reduces puffiness, dark circles, fine lines, and wrinkles, giving you a fresh and youthful appearance. Its rich formula, packed with natural ingredients and antioxidants, contains 5% caffeine to stimulate blood circulation and tighten skin, hyaluronic acid to moisturize and plump the skin, and vitamin C to brighten and smooth the skin. The formula is vegan, free of parabens, sulfates, silicones, and artificial colors. It comes in an easy-to-use bottle with a precise dropper, has a lightweight and fast-absorbing texture, and has a pleasant and refreshing scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Serum Shot 5% Caffeine Puffiness Reduction 30ml**:
â­ Apply a few drops to clean and dry skin around the eyes, gently tapping.
â­ Use twice a day, morning and evening, or as needed.
â­ For best results, use in combination with other **Eveline** products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Serum Shot 5% Caffeine Puffiness Reduction 30ml**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ascorbic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Parfum, Limonene, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal.

description_en:
**Eveline Beauty & Glow Illuminate&Smoothing Body Lotion** delivers radiance, hydration, and smoothness.  Its unique formula with gold particles illuminates the skin, giving it a healthy, radiant look. Enriched with natural ingredients and a vegan formula containing Vitamins A, E, C, Cg, B3, B5, and F for deep hydration and nourishment.  Quick-absorbing and non-greasy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Beauty & Glow Illuminate&Smoothing Body Lotion**: 
â­ Apply lotion to clean, dry skin. 
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed. 
â­ Use daily or as needed, preferably after showering.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Beauty & Glow Illuminate&Smoothing Body Lotion**: 
â­ Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Niacinamide, Citrus Aurantium Amara Flower Water, Prunus Persica Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantifolia Seed Butter, Mica, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Parfum, CI 77891, CI 77491.

description_en:
**Eveline Serum Shot 3x Collagen Restoration And Renewal 30ml** is a luxurious facial serum designed to rejuvenate and revitalize your skin. â­ Enriched with 3x collagen, 24k gold, and elastin. â­ Reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. â­ Deeply moisturizes and softens the skin. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Fast-absorbing, leaves no greasy residue. â­ Natural botanical formula, free of parabens and sulfates.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Serum Shot 3x Collagen Restoration And Renewal 30ml**: 
â­ Apply a few drops to clean, dry skin. â­ Gently massage until absorbed. â­ Use morning and night. â­ For best results, use with other Eveline products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Serum Shot 3x Collagen Restoration And Renewal 30ml**: 
â­ Aqua (Water), Propylene Glycol, Propanediol, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Retinyl Palmitate, Bakuchiol, Cichorium Intybus Leaf Extract, Withania Somnifera Extract, Squalane, Avena Sativa Kernel Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Maltodextrin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, CI 77499.

**Eveline Serum Shot 2% Hyaluronic Acid Moisturization 30ml** is an intensive treatment that provides optimal hydration and soothes the skin. â­ Vegan formula, kind to skin and the environment. â­ Free from parabens, sulfates, silicones, and artificial colors. â­ Not tested on animals. â­ Contains 2% hyaluronic acid, trehalose, and vitamin B5. â­ Lightweight and fast-absorbing texture. â­ Pleasant and refreshing fragrance. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Serum Shot 2% Hyaluronic Acid Moisturization 30ml**: â­ Apply a few drops to clean, dry skin. â­ Gently massage. â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening. â­ For best results, use with other Eveline products.

description_en:
**Eveline Serum Shot Multi Peptides Ceramide Rejuvenation 30ml** is a luxurious serum designed to rejuvenate your skin. â­ Rich in peptides, ceramides, and collagen, it moisturizes, firms, and smoothes your skin. â­ Reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. â­ Suitable for mature skin. â­ Vegan formula, cruelty-free, and free of parabens, sulfates, silicones, and artificial colors. â­ Easy to use with a convenient dropper applicator. â­ Absorbs quickly without leaving any sticky residue. â­ Refreshing scent. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Serum Shot Multi Peptides Ceramide Rejuvenation 30ml**: 
â­ Apply a few drops to clean, dry skin. â­ Gently massage with your fingertips. â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Serum Shot Multi Peptides Ceramide Rejuvenation 30ml**: 
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Polyethylene, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Palmitoyl Dipeptide-10, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Acetyl Octapeptide-3, Copper Tripeptide-1, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ascorbic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum, Limonene, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, CI 77499.

description_en:
**Eveline Beauty & Glow Moisturizing & Firming Body Lotion 350ml** soothes dryness, regenerates, and tightens. The formula of the balm makes the body velvety smooth and pleasant to the touch. Vegan balm formula contains a complex of vitamins (A, E, C, Cg, B3, B5 and F) to ensure excellent nourishment and hydration of the skin. Coconut water makes the body pleasantly smooth. Natural caffeine stimulates the skin and improves its elasticity, and the banana takes care of the regeneration of the epidermis. Hyaluronic acid ensures that the skin is optimally hydrated and soothed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Beauty & Glow Moisturizing & Firming Body Lotion 350ml**:
â­ Apply the lotion to clean and dry skin, preferably after a bath or shower.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Beauty & Glow Moisturizing & Firming Body Lotion 350ml**:
â­ Aqua, Paraffinum Liquidum, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Dimethicone, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pearl Extract, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Eveline Serum Shot 15% Glycolic Acid Smoothing 30ml** is a powerful serum for smoothing and renewing your skin. â­Effectively removes dead skin cells. â­Opens pores. â­Reduces the appearance of wrinkles, scars, and discoloration. â­Moisturizes and nourishes the skin. â­Leaves skin soft, radiant, and even-toned. It contains 15% Glycolic Acid, Gluconolactone, and Mandelic Acid. Vegan formula, free of parabens, sulfates, silicones, and artificial colors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Serum Shot 15% Glycolic Acid Smoothing 30ml**: 
â­Apply a few drops to clean, dry skin, avoiding the eye and mouth area. 
â­Massage gently for one minute, then leave for 10 minutes as a mask. 
â­Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. 
â­Use 1-3 times a week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Serum Shot 15% Glycolic Acid Smoothing 30ml**: 
â­Aqua, Glycolic Acid, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Polyethylene, Gluconolactone, Mandelic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Parfum, Limonene, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, CI 77499.

description_en:
**Eveline Beauty & Glow Regenerate & Nourish Body Lotion 350ml** is a luxurious body balm that rebuilds, moisturizes, and deeply nourishes your skin. Its effective vegan formula is rich in vitamins A, E, C, Cg, B3, B5, and F, acting as a nourishing mask for the body, giving tired skin relief and regeneration. It contains Shea butter which provides intensive hydration and velvety softness. It's fast-absorbing and leaves no greasy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Beauty & Glow Regenerate & Nourish Body Lotion 350ml**:
â­ Apply the lotion onto clean and dry skin, rubbing in gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily or as needed, preferably after showering or bathing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Beauty & Glow Regenerate & Nourish Body Lotion 350ml**:
â­Aqua, Paraffinum Liquidum, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Dimethicone, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pearl Extract, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool2.

description_en:
**Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Peeling Mask 3in1 75ml** is the perfect solution for acne-prone skin. This multi-functional mask combines the benefits of peeling, paste, and mask in one unique formula. **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Peeling Mask 3in1 75ml** deeply cleanses, exfoliates dead skin cells, and nourishes the skin leaving it soft, matte, and refreshed. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Peeling Mask 3in1 75ml**: 
â­ Apply a thin layer to a wet face, avoiding the eye and mouth area.
â­ Gently massage for one minute, then leave on for another 10 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Use 1-3 times a week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Peeling Mask 3in1 75ml**: 
â­ Aqua, Kaolin, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Polyethylene, Charcoal Powder, Mandelic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Lactobionic Acid, Shikimic Acid, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Niacinamide, Allantoin, Panthenol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum, Limonene, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, CI 77499.

title_en: Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Spot Roll-On 15ml
title_ar: Ø§ÙŠÙÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø¨ÙŠØ±ÙÙƒØª Ø³ÙƒÙŠÙ† Ø±ÙˆÙ„ Ø§ÙˆÙ† Ù„Ø¢Ø«Ø§Ø± Ø­Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¨Ø§Ø¨ 15 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
**Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Spot Roll-On** is a fast and effective solution for acne-prone skin.  Its advanced antibacterial formula with natural ingredients quickly eliminates blackheads and blemishes, dries and purifies them, soothes inflammation and redness, and visibly improves the appearance of problematic skin. It contains a complex of 5% Shikimic Acid, Mandelic Acid, Tea Tree Extract, and Burdock, in addition to Zinc, Copper, and Sulfur. The roll-on design allows for direct application to affected areas without touching them with your fingers, minimizing the risk of bacterial spread.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Spot Roll-On**:
â­ Apply the product to cleansed and dry skin, focusing on affected areas.
â­ Use twice a day, morning and evening, or as needed.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Spot Roll-On**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Propanediol, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Shikimic Acid, Zinc PCA, Mandelic Acid, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propylene Glycol, Betula Alba Bark/Leaf Extract, Juniperus Oxycedrus Wood Oil, Salix Alba Bark Extract, Gluconolactone, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Sulfur, Copper Pca, Calcium Gluconate.

description_en:
**Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Face Cleansing Foam 150ml** is a daily facial cleanser that effectively improves the appearance of acne-prone skin. It removes dead skin cells, unclogs pores, and reduces the appearance of blackheads and pimples. Its light and refreshing formula deeply cleanses without drying. Leaves skin feeling fresh, soft, and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Face Cleansing Foam 150ml**: 
â­ Wet your face with lukewarm water. 
â­ Apply a small amount of foam to your hands. 
â­ Gently massage the foam onto your face using circular motions, avoiding the eye area. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly with cool water. 
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Face Cleansing Foam 150ml**: 
â­ Aqua (Water) â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine â­ Glycerin â­ Sodium Cocoamphoacetate â­ Mandelic Acid â­ Shikimic Acid â­ Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract â­ Laminaria Hyperborea Extract â­ PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil â­ Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer â­ Sodium Hydroxide â­ Phenoxyethanol â­ Ethylhexylglycerin â­ Parfum (Fragrance) â­ Limonene â­ Linalool â­ CI 42090 (Blue 1).

description_en:
**Eveline** Protection And Moisturizing Skin Cream is your perfect skincare solution!  This cream provides superior sun protection with SPF 50, shielding your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays, preventing premature aging and dark spots. Its rich formula, packed with natural ingredients and Vitamins A, E, and F, deeply moisturizes and nourishes your skin. Its non-greasy texture is easily absorbed and suitable even for sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline**: 
â­ Apply the cream to clean, dry skin, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Use before and during sun exposure, reapplying every 2 hours.
â­ Follow with a suitable moisturizer or serum.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline**: 
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate
â­ Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate
â­ Propanediol
â­ Glycerin
â­ and other natural ingredients.

title_ar: **Ø§ÙŠÙÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø¨ÙŠØ±ÙÙƒØª Ø³ÙƒÙŠÙ† Ø¬Ù„ Ø§Ù„ØªÙ†Ø¸ÙŠÙ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ Ù„Ø­Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¨Ø§Ø¨ 150 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Face Deep Cleansing Gel 150ml** is a powerful deep cleansing gel specially formulated for acne-prone and problematic skin. â­It contains a blend of AHA, BHA, and PHA acids, making it an effective exfoliant that removes dead skin cells, unclogs pores, and prevents the formation of blackheads and pimples. â­It also includes niacinamide and licorice root extract, which soothe the skin and reduce redness and inflammation. â­It deeply cleanses the skin of dirt, impurities, and excess oils, leaving it feeling refreshed, smooth, and matte. â­Ideal for achieving clear and healthy skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Face Deep Cleansing Gel 150ml**: â­Wet your face with warm water. â­Apply a small amount of gel onto your hands. â­Massage the gel onto your face using circular motions, avoiding the eye area. â­Rinse thoroughly with water and pat your skin dry with a towel. â­Use once daily, preferably in the evening, or as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Face Deep Cleansing Gel 150ml**: â­Aqua (Water), Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Charcoal Powder, Mandelic Acid, Shikimic Acid, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Citrus Limon Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Hypericum Perforatum Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Mentha Piperita Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis Leaf Extract, Saponaria Officinalis Root Extract, Xanthan Gum, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum (Fragrance), Citric Acid, Propylene Glycol.

title_en: **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Night Exfoliating Serum 5% 30ml**
title_ar: **Ø§ÙŠÙÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø¨ÙŠØ±ÙÙƒØª Ø³ÙƒÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ù„ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ 5% Ù…Ù‚Ø´Ø± Ø®ÙÙŠÙ Ù„Ø­Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¨Ø§Ø¨ 30 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Night Exfoliating Serum 5% 30ml** is a powerful overnight exfoliating serum designed for acne-prone and problematic skin. â­It contains a 5% complex of AHA, BHA, and PHA acids, effective exfoliants that remove dead skin cells, unclog pores, and prevent blackheads and pimples. â­It also contains niacinamide and licorice extract, which soothe the skin and reduce redness and inflammation. â­It deeply cleanses the skin of dirt, impurities, and excess oil, leaving it refreshed and smooth. â­Ideal for achieving clear and healthy skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Night Exfoliating Serum 5% 30ml**: â­Apply the serum to cleansed skin, avoiding the eye area. â­Use daily at night. â­Use sunscreen in the morning. â­Temporary redness or peeling may occur, which is normal.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Eveline Perfect Skin Acne Night Exfoliating Serum 5% 30ml**: â­Aqua, Propanediol, Shikimic Acid, Lactic Acid, Lactobionic Acid, Mandelic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Gluconolactone, Niacinamide, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Aminomethyl Propanol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Propylene Glycol, Disodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Calcium Gluconate, Sodium Phosphate.

#Skincare #Faceserum #Acne #Exfoliator #Eveline #HealthySkin #Beauty #SkincareRoutine #SmoothSkin #SkincareProducts

description_en:
**Fa Shower Cream Cocoa Butter & Coco Oil 250 ml** offers a luxurious shower experience with a unique blend of refreshing essential oils and skin-caring ingredients that leave you feeling refreshed and comfortable all day long. Indulge yourself and enjoy the pleasure of showering with **Fa Shower Cream Cocoa Butter & Coco Oil 250 ml** and discover the secret to glowing, soft skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fa Shower Cream Cocoa Butter & Coco Oil 250 ml**: 
â­ Wet your body thoroughly with water. 
â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Fa Shower Cream Cocoa Butter & Coco Oil 250 ml** to your body. 
â­ Gently massage your body until a rich lather forms. 
â­ Rinse your body thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fa Shower Cream Cocoa Butter & Coco Oil 250 ml**: 
â­ aqua (water) â­ sodium laureth sulfate â­ cocamidopropyl betaine â­ sodium chloride â­ glyceryl laurate â­ cocos nucifera (coconut) oil â­ glycol distearate â­ disodium laureth sulfosuccinate â­ Parfum (Fragrance) â­ laureth-2 â­ laureth-4 â­ propylene glycol â­ hydrogenated castor oil â­ peg-7 glyceryl cocoate â­ peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil â­ peg-55 propylene glycol oleate â­ sodium hydroxide â­ Citric Acid â­ linalool â­ coumarin â­ benzyl salicylate â­ limonene â­ sodium benzoate â­ sodium salicylate â­ benzyl alcohol â­ ci 47005 â­ ci 16035

description_en:
**Fa Deo Spray Attraction Force for Men, 48 Hrs, 150 ml** offers powerful 48-hour protection against body odor with a bold, masculine scent. Designed for the modern man, this deodorant spray keeps you feeling fresh and confident all day long.  It's perfect for active men who want a revitalizing fragrance and reliable protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fa Deo Spray Attraction Force for Men, 48 Hrs, 150 ml**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15cm away from the body and spray directly onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Focus on underarms or other sweat-prone areas.
â­ Allow to dry before dressing.
â­ Use daily after showering for enhanced protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fa Deo Spray Attraction Force for Men, 48 Hrs, 150 ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glyceryl Stearate
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Sodium Stearate
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Methylparaben
â­ Ethylparaben

description_en:
**Fa Roll On Sport Recharge for Men, 50ml** is a refreshing and energizing deodorant designed to keep you feeling fresh and confident throughout your active day.  Its long-lasting formula provides effective protection against body odor, while the invigorating scent boosts your energy. Ideal for sports and high-intensity activities, this roll-on deodorant keeps you dry and fresh for up to 72 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fa Roll On Sport Recharge for Men, 50ml**:
â­ Shake the bottle before use.
â­ Apply to clean, dry skin, focusing on the underarms.
â­ Let the deodorant dry completely before getting dressed.
â­ Use daily, especially after showering or physical activities.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fa Roll On Sport Recharge for Men, 50ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glyceryl Stearate
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Methylparaben
â­ Ethylparaben

**Fa Deo Spray Caribbean Lemon 150 ml** - Embark on a refreshing journey with the inspiring scents of **Fa**. Innovative body care products from **Fa** pamper your senses and leave you feeling fantastic every day. **Fa** is a leading global brand in body care, with products available worldwide, from Europe to the Middle East, Asia, and the Pacific.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fa Deo Spray Caribbean Lemon 150 ml**:

**Fa Shower Cream Yoghurt & Aloe Vera 250 ml** is a nourishing body wash with a refreshing scent. Treat yourself daily to the perfect combination of creamy yoghurt shower cream and splendid aloe vera. Enjoy a luxurious shower experience.  A gentle formula rich in proteins, protects skin from drying, leaving it feeling incredibly soft. Free from mineral oil, pH skin neutral & dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fa Shower Cream Yoghurt & Aloe Vera 250 ml**:
â­ Wet your body thoroughly.

â­ Rinse your body thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fa Shower Cream Yoghurt & Aloe Vera 250 ml**:
â­ Yoghurt proteins

description_en:
**Fair & Lovely Cream Multi-Vitamin 25 gm** for a brighter, more radiant complexion. **Fair & Lovely Cream Multi-Vitamin 25 gm** gives you soft, healthy-looking skin. â­ Works like laser light to give best fairness. â­ Goes deep inside to brighten dark skin cells. â­ Gives glowing radiant fairness. â­ Provides sun protection. â­ Matt, non oily feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fair & Lovely Cream Multi-Vitamin 25 gm**:
â­ Smooth onto face and exposed part of the skin at least 10 minutes before sun exposure. â­ Re-apply every 2 hours for effective sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fair & Lovely Cream Multi-Vitamin 25 gm**:
â­ Water, palmatic acid and stearic acid, niancinamide, glycerin, dimethicone, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, titanium dioxide, sodium ascorbyl phosphate, isopropyl myristate, tocopheryl acetate, allantoin, pyridoxine hydrocholride, cetyl alcohol, aluminium hydroxide, phenoxyethanol, metthylparaben, propylparaben, potassium hydroxide, disodium EDTA, perfume, alpha-isomethyl ionone, benzyl salicylate, butylphenyl methylpropional, citronellol, geraniol, hexyl cinnamal, coumarin, cinnamyl alcohol, limonene, linalool.

description_en:
**Fair & Lovely** Multi-Vitamin Face Cream is your ultimate solution for radiant and glowing skin. This amazing cream provides fairness like laser treatment, thanks to its unique formula enriched with vitamins. â­ Noticeably brightens skin. â­ Gives skin a natural glow. â­ Protects skin from harmful sun rays. â­ Light and non-oily formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fair & Lovely**: 
â­Smooth onto face and exposed skin at least 10 minutes before sun exposure. â­Reapply every 2 hours for effective sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fair & Lovely**: 
â­Water, palmatic acid and stearic acid, niancinamide, glycerin, dimethicone, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, titanium dioxide, sodium ascorbyl phosphate, isopropyl myristate, tocopheryl acetate, allantoin, pyridoxine hydrocholride, cetyl alcohol, aluminium hydroxide, phenoxyethanol, metthylparaben, propylparaben, potassium hydroxide, disodium EDTA, perfume, alpha-isomethyl ionone, benzyl salicylate, butylphenyl methylpropional, citronellol, geraniol, hexyl cinnamal, coumarin, cinnamyl alcohol, limonene, linalool.

description_en:
**Fair & Lovely** Herbal Balance Face Cream, a unique blend of 16 natural ingredients to even out skin tone and illuminate your complexion. â­ Gives you balanced and healthy skin. â­ Clears marks and brightens complexion. â­ Calms and soothes skin. â­ Provides sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fair & Lovely**:
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening, after cleansing your face.
â­ For best results, use **Fair & Lovely** face wash before the cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fair & Lovely**:
â­ Water, palmitic acid and stearic acid, octyl methoxycinnamate, glycerin, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, isopropyl myristate, potassium hydroxide, cetyl alcohol, dimethicone, rubia cordifolia extract, titanium dioxide and aliminium hydroxide, zinc oxide, allantoin, phenoxyethanol, methylparaben, wheat germ oil, symplocos racemosa extract, disodium EDTA, propyl paraben, sesamum indicum, crocus sativus extract, glycyrriza glabra extract, milk, santalum album extract, vetiveria zizanioides extract, prunus cerasiodes extract, monochoria vaginalis extract, ficus bengalensis extract, caesalpinia sappan extract, LAC, nelumbo nucifera extract, BHT, Parfum, CI 17200.

**Fair & Lovely Cream Max Fairness For Men 100 gm** is the perfect cream for brighter, healthier-looking skin. â­ Provides brighter skin. â­ Protects your skin from harmful sun rays. â­ Oil-free formula. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fair & Lovely Cream Max Fairness For Men 100 gm**: 
â­ Smooth onto face and exposed skin at least 10 minutes before sun exposure. 
â­ Reapply every 2 hours for effective sun protection. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fair & Lovely Cream Max Fairness For Men 100 gm**: 
â­ Water, palmitic acid, stearic acid, niacinamide, glycerin, isopropyl myristate, allantoin, aluminum hydroxide, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, dimethicone, hydroxystearic acid, menthol, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, pyridoxine hcl, sodium ascorbyl phosphate, titanium dioxide, tocopheryl acetate, potassium hydroxide, cetyl alcohol, disodium edta, xanthan gum, parfum, methylparaben, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, lactose, microcrystalline cellulose, sucrose, zea mays starch, ci 77007, alpha-isomethyl ionone, benzyl alcohol, butyl phenyl methylpropional, citral, citronellol, coumarin, geraniol, limonene, linalool.

description_en:
**Fair & Lovely Cream Max Fairness For Men 50 gm** is the perfect solution for brighter, healthier-looking skin. â­ Provides smoother skin â­ Protects your skin from harmful sun rays â­ Lightweight, non-greasy formula â­ Easy to apply and quickly absorbed

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fair & Lovely Cream Max Fairness For Men 50 gm**:
â­ Apply cream to face and exposed skin at least 10 minutes before sun exposure. 
â­ Reapply every 2 hours for effective sun protection. 
â­ For external use only. 
â­ If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fair & Lovely Cream Max Fairness For Men 50 gm**:
â­ Water, palmitic acid, stearic acid, niacinamide, glycerin, isopropyl myristate, allantoin, aluminum hydroxide, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, dimethicone, hydroxystearic acid, menthol, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, pyridoxine hcl, sodium ascorbyl phosphate, titanium dioxide, tocopheryl acetate, potassium hydroxide, cetyl alcohol, disodium edta, xanthan gum, parfum, methylparaben, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, lactose, microcrystalline cellulose, sucrose, zea mays starch, ci 77007, alpha-isomethyl ionone, benzyl alcohol, butyl phenyl methylpropional, citral, citronellol, coumarin, geraniol, limonene, linalool.

description_en:
**Fino Premium Touch Hair Mask 230g** is a luxurious hair mask designed for dry, damaged, colored, and permed hair. It deeply nourishes and hydrates hair with its rich formula containing Royal Jelly EX, PCA (Para-Chloroamphetamine), and Lipidure EX.  Seven natural essences help retain moisture, prevent breakage, and protect color from UV rays, leaving your hair noticeably soft, shiny, and healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fino Premium Touch Hair Mask**:
â­ Apply the mask to clean, damp hair after shampooing.
â­ Gently massage into hair and leave for 5-10 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly. Use 1-2 times per week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fino Premium Touch Hair Mask**:
â­ Water, sorbitol, dimethicone, hydrogenated rapeseed alcohol, isopentyldiol, Behentrimonium chloride, aminopropyl dimethicone, Hydroxypropyl arginine lauryl/myristyl ether HCL, stearyl dihydroxypropyldimonium oligosaccharides, glutamic acid, trehalose, squalane, steartrimonium chloride, PEG-90M, PCA, phytosteryl/octyldodecyl lauroyl glutamate, hydrolyzed wheat protein, polyquaternium-64, hydrolyzed wheat starch, royal jelly extract, isopropanol, cetanol, octyldodecanol, ethanol, PG, BG, tocopherol, phenoxy ethanol, sodium benzoate, fragrance, Yellow 5

description_en:
**Fino Premium Touch Hair Oil 70ml** is a luxurious hair oil designed to intensively repair and deeply moisturize damaged hair. This oil is the perfect follow-up treatment after using the famous **Fino** hair mask. Do you suffer from dry or damaged hair due to weather conditions or chemical treatments? **Fino Premium Touch Hair Oil 70ml** is the perfect solution! Its unique formula nourishes your hair from roots to ends, giving it irresistible smoothness and shine. **Garnier Skin Active Micellar Cleansing Water 400 ml**, the No. 1 Micellar Water worldwide*, is the all-in-one solution for all skin types, even sensitive skin. Suitable for face, eyes, and lips. Removes makeup, cleanses, and soothes in one swipe. Garnier's micellar technology effortlessly removes dirt and makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skin Active Micellar Cleansing Water 400 ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount to a cotton pad.
â­ Apply to face, eyes, or lips.
â­ Leave for 5 seconds.
â­ Gently wipe without rubbing or rinsing.

â­AQUA / WATER

â­ Apply a few drops to your face and neck.

**Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water 700ml**, the No.1 Micellar Water worldwide*, is an all-in-one solution for all skin types, even sensitive skin. Suitable for face, eyes, and lips.  It cleanses, removes makeup, and soothes in one swipe.  Advanced micellar technology easily removes dirt and makeup.  No rubbing required, alcohol-free and fragrance-free.

**Garnier Skinactive Super UV Invisible Serum Sunscreen 30ml** is a lightweight, invisible sunscreen that protects your skin from harmful sun rays. With SPF 50+ and PA++++, this serum provides very high protection against UVA, UVB, and long UVA rays. It corrects sunspots and protects against 99% of sun damage. Enriched with Vitamin C, this serum is easily absorbed and leaves no white cast.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skinactive Super UV Invisible Serum Sunscreen 30ml**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount daily to your skin in the morning, as the last step in your skincare routine.
â­ Use the two-finger rule for maximum protection.
â­ Don't forget to reapply throughout the day, especially after swimming or sweating.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skinactive Super UV Invisible Serum Sunscreen 30ml**:
â­ Vitamin C
â­ Active ingredients that provide high sun protection

**Garnier Color Naturals Creme Hair Color Dark Brown 3** provides long-lasting, rich color and up to 100% gray coverage. Enriched with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter, this nourishing formula leaves your hair feeling soft, shiny, and healthy. ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Color Naturals Creme Hair Color Dark Brown 3**:
â­ Perform a skin allergy test 48 hours prior to use.

â­ Leave it for 30 minutes, then rinse with water and apply conditioner.

â­ Avocado Oil

description_en:
**Garnier Skin Active Micellar Cleansing Water In Oil** is the NUMBER 1 PREFERRED WATERPROOF MAKE UP REMOVER BY ARAB WOMEN*.  An all-in-one solution for all skin types, even sensitive. Suitable for face, eyes, and lips.

â­ Removes 96% of makeup, even waterproof, in one swipe.
â­ Gently cleanses.
â­ Enriched with Moroccan Argan Oil.
â­ Non-greasy formula.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive.
â­ No rubbing or rinsing needed.
â­ Leaves skin feeling fresh and clean.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skin Active Micellar Cleansing Water In Oil**: Apply to a cotton pad and gently wipe across face, eyes, and lips. Leave for five seconds and wipe gently without rubbing or rinsing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skin Active Micellar Cleansing Water In Oil**: Aqua / Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isohexadecane, Argania Spinosa Oil / Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, CI 60725 / Violet 2, Decyl Glucoside, Dipotassium Phosphate, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Haematococcus Pluvialis / Haematococcus Pluvialis Extract, Hexylene Glycol, Limonene, Linalool, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide, Potassium Phosphate, Sodium Chloride, Parfum / Fragrance. (F.I.L. B176670/1)

**Garnier Skin Active Fast Bright Mask - 28g**. One mask equals one week of hydrating serum!* â­ Infused with milky essence and brightening Vitamin C, this mask leaves your skin milky smooth and bright after just 15 minutes. â­ Suitable for dull skin looking for an instant fairness boost. â­ Recommended for use 3 times a week. â­ Proven efficacy: After 15 minutes, skin looks 1 tone fairer and hydrated. After 1 week, skin is radiant and glowing; dark spots are lightened. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skin Active Fast Bright Mask - 28g**: 
â­ Unfold the mask and gently apply it to a clean face. â­ Leave it on for 15 minutes. â­ Remove the mask and gently massage in any excess serum or use a cotton pad to remove it. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skin Active Fast Bright Mask - 28g**: 
â­AQUA / WATER, GLYCERIN, BETAINE, RHAMNOSE, ALUMINA, AMMONIUM POLYACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER / SHEA BUTTER, CETYL ALCOHOL, CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE, CITRIC ACID, CITRUS JUNOS FRUIT EXTRACT, COCOS NUCIFERA FRUIT JUICE / COCONUT FRUIT JUICE, DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE, DISODIUM EDTA, GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, HEXYLDECANOL, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, LINALOOL, MALTODEXTRIN, MYRISTIC ACID, OCTYLDODECANOL, PALMITIC ACID, PEG-100 STEARATE, PHENYLETHYL RESORCINOL, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SILICA, SODIUM BENZOATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, STEARIC ACID, TOCOPHEROL, XANTHAN GUM, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE (F.I.L C242209/1).

description_en:
**Garnier Skin Active Night Serum With Vitamin C 30 ml** is a powerful night serum from Garnier. â­Formulated with 10% pure Vitamin C to visibly brighten skin and reduce the appearance of dark spots. â­ Noticeable results from the first use. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Lightweight and fast-absorbing formula. â­ Recommended for nighttime use, followed by a moisturizer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skin Active Night Serum With Vitamin C 30 ml**: â­ Apply a pea-sized amount to cleansed skin every night. â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed. â­ Follow with a moisturizer for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skin Active Night Serum With Vitamin C 30 ml**: â­ 10% Pure Vitamin C. â­ Moisturizing ingredients. â­ Skin-nourishing ingredients.

description_en:
**Garnier Hair Color Brown 4** is a permanent hair color that nourishes your hair and gives it a rich, long-lasting color. It covers up to 100% of gray hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Hair Color Brown 4**:
â­ Perform a skin allergy test before use.
â­ Mix the developer and colorant in a 1:1 ratio in a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Apply the color to your hair from roots to tips, dividing your hair into sections.
â­ Leave it for 30 minutes, then rinse thoroughly and apply conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Hair Color Brown 4**:
â­ Nourishing oils (avocado, olive, shea).
â­ High-quality hair color.
â­ Moisturizing conditioner.

description_en:
**Garnier Color Naturals** provides a long-lasting, light ashy blonde hair color with up to 100% gray coverage. Enriched with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter, this nourishing hair color leaves your hair feeling soft, shiny, and healthy. Achieve a vibrant, radiant color that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Color Naturals**: 
â­ Perform a skin allergy test before coloring. 
â­ Mix developer and colorant in a 1:1 ratio in a non-metallic bowl. 
â­ Apply to roots then ends, sectioning hair for even coverage. 
â­ Leave for 30 minutes, rinse thoroughly, and apply conditioner. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Color Naturals**: 
â­ Avocado Oil 
â­ Olive Oil 
â­ Shea Butter

description_en:
**Garnier Color Naturals** provides a permanent hair color that nourishes your hair and gives it a very light gray blonde color with up to 100% gray hair coverage. Enriched with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter, to nourish your hair even after coloring. For the perfect color, choose the right shade for your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Color Naturals**: 
â­ Perform a skin allergy test before coloring. 
â­ Mix the developer and colorant in a 1:1 ratio in a non-metallic bowl. 
â­ Apply the color to the roots and then the ends, dividing your hair into even sections. 
â­ Leave it for 30 minutes, then rinse with water and apply conditioner. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Color Naturals**: 
â­ Permanent hair color. 
â­ Avocado oil. 
â­ Olive oil. 
â­ Shea butter. 
â­ Moisturizing conditioner.

description_en:
**Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water In Oil 100 Ml**, the No.1 waterproof makeup remover preferred by Arab women*. An all-in-one cleanser for all skin types, even sensitive skin. Suitable for face, eyes, and lips. Removes 96% of makeup, especially waterproof, in one swipe. Cleanses and soothes. Enriched with micelles and Moroccan Argan Oil for easy removal of heavy makeup. When the two layers are mixed, the formula is doubled to remove all types of makeup and pollution. Result: Clean and refreshed skin without a greasy feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water In Oil 100 Ml**
â­ Apply a small amount to a cotton pad.
â­ Apply to face, eyes, or lips.
â­ Leave for five seconds.
â­ Gently wipe without rubbing or rinsing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water In Oil 100 Ml**
â­AQUA / WATER
â­CYCLOPENTASILOXANE
â­ISOHEXADECANE
â­ARGANIA SPINOSA OIL / ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL
â­BENZYL ALCOHOL
â­BENZYL SALICYLATE
â­BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE
â­CI 60725 / VIOLET 2
â­DECYL GLUCOSIDE
â­DIPOTASSIUM PHOSPHATE
â­DISODIUM EDTA
â­ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE
â­ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE
â­GERANIOL
â­HAEMATOCOCCUS PLUVIALIS / HAEMATOCOCCUS PLUVIALIS EXTRACT
â­HEXYLENE GLYCOL
â­LIMONENE
â­LINALOOL
â­PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINAMATE
â­POLYAMINOPROPYL BIGUANIDE
â­POTASSIUM PHOSPHATE
â­SODIUM CHLORIDE
â­PARFUM / FRAGRANCE. (F.I.L. B176670/1)

â­ Visibly reduces pimples and dark spots.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Fragrance-free formula.

â­ Pour onto a cotton pad.
â­ Gently swipe across face, eyes, and lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skinactive Micellar Water Salicylic Acid 400ml**:

description_en:
**Garnier Skinactive Fast Clear Booster Serum with Salicylic Acid 15 ml** is a powerful serum formulated with 4% Salicylic Acid, Vitamin C, Niacinamide, and AHA. This unique blend helps fight acne and fade acne spots, leaving your skin visibly brighter and clearer. â­Reduces the appearance of dark spots. â­Soothes skin and fades acne marks. â­Reduces inflammation and tightens pores. â­Prevents new acne breakouts. Dermatologically tested and clinically proven to treat acne and dark spots in 3 days. Suitable for acne-prone, oily, and combination skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skinactive Fast Clear Booster Serum with Salicylic Acid 15 ml**: â­Apply evenly to cleansed skin. â­Use daily, morning and night, before moisturizer. â­Avoid the eye area. â­If contact with eyes occurs, rinse immediately and thoroughly. â­Use sunscreen during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skinactive Fast Clear Booster Serum with Salicylic Acid 15 ml**: â­Salicylic Acid â­Vitamin C â­Niacinamide â­AHA.

**Garnier Active Charcoal Tissue Mask 28 Gm** - 1 mask = 1 week of hydrating serum!* This breakthrough innovation from Asia is infused with Natural Charcoal, known for its excellent absorbing properties to catch impurities that clog pores.  Enriched with Black Seaweed extract, LHA & Hyaluronic Acid, it visibly reduces pores and purifies the skin while leaving it hydrated. Suitable for sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Active Charcoal Tissue Mask 28 Gm**:
â­ Unfold the mask and gently apply it to a clean face.
â­ Adjust the mask to fit the contours of your face.
â­ Leave it on for 15 minutes.
â­ Remove the mask and gently massage any excess product into your skin or use a cotton pad to remove it.

(Ingredients may vary, please refer to the product packaging for the full list.)

description_en:
**Garnier Skin Active Hydra Bomb Mask Pomegranate For Dehydrated Skin 32 gm** is a super hydrating mask. â­Provides a week's worth of intense hydration thanks to its formula enriched with pomegranate extract and hyaluronic acid. â­Acts like a moisturizing compress that continuously diffuses the effectiveness of the serum to intensely hydrate your skin. â­Suitable for sensitive skin. â­Paraben-free. â­Softens the skin and gives it a radiant glow after just 15 minutes. â­Reduces the appearance of fine lines after one week of regular use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skin Active Hydra Bomb Mask Pomegranate For Dehydrated Skin 32 gm**:
â­Unfold the mask. â­Gently apply to a clean face. â­Remove the blue protective film. â­Adjust the mask to your face. â­Leave on for 15 minutes. â­Remove the mask gently. â­Massage gently to absorb excess formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skin Active Hydra Bomb Mask Pomegranate For Dehydrated Skin 32 gm**:
â­AQUA / WATER. â­PROPYLENE GLYCOL. â­GLYCERIN. â­ALCOHOL. â­p-ANISIC ACID. â­DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE. â­GLYCERYL ACRYLATE/ACRYLIC ACID COPOLYMER. â­HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA LEAF WATER / WITCH HAZEL LEAF WATER. â­HYDROGENATED STARCH HYDROLYSATE. â­HYDROXYACETOPHENONE. â­HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE. â­LIMONENE. â­MANOSE. â­PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL. â­PHENOXYETHANOL. â­POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE. â­POTASSIUM SORBATE. â­PUNICA GRANATUM FRUIT EXTRACT. â­PVM/MA COPOLYMER. â­SODIUM BENZOATE. â­SODIUM HYALURONATE. â­SORBIC ACID. â­XANTHAN GUM. â­PARFUM / FRAGRANCE.

description_en:
**Garnier Hair Color Blue Black 2.1** provides long-lasting, rich blue-black color with up to 100% gray coverage. Enriched with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter for nourished, shiny hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Hair Color Blue Black 2.1**:
â­ Perform a skin allergy test 48 hours before use.
â­ Mix developer and colorant in a 1:1 ratio in a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Apply from roots to ends, sectioning hair.
â­ Leave for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse, apply conditioner, and rinse again.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Hair Color Blue Black 2.1**:
â­ Avocado Oil
â­ Olive Oil
â­ Shea Butter

description_en:
**Garnier Skinactive Fast Clear Booster Serum with Salicylic Acid 30 ml** is a powerful serum with a unique formula containing 4% Salicylic Acid, Vitamin C, Niacinamide, and AHA. It helps fight acne, reduce dark spots, and soothe skin for a visibly brighter and clearer complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skinactive Fast Clear Booster Serum with Salicylic Acid 30 ml**:
â­ Apply a few drops to clean skin morning and night before moisturizer.
â­ Spread evenly on the face, avoiding the eye area.
â­ In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use sunscreen during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skinactive Fast Clear Booster Serum with Salicylic Acid 30 ml**:
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ Vitamin C
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA)

Dermatologically tested and clinically proven to treat acne and dark spots in 3 days. Suitable for acne-prone, oily, and combination skin. #Garnier #FastClearSerum #AcneTreatment #HealthySkin #Skincare #ClearSkin #BrightSkin #SkincareRoutine #BeautyProducts #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
**Garnier Men Shampoo Color 3.0 Black Brown** provides natural-looking hair color that lasts up to 5 weeks.  Easy to apply like a shampoo, this ammonia-free formula is enriched with coffee extract and nourishing argan oil. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Men Shampoo Color 3.0 Black Brown**:
â­ Put on gloves.
â­ Pour the mixture into your hands.
â­ Apply to dry hair like a shampoo.
â­ Wait 5 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Men Shampoo Color 3.0 Black Brown**:
â­ Coffee Extract
â­ Argan Oil

Important: Perform an allergy test 48 hours before use.

description_en:
**Garnier Fast Bright Vitamin C & Lemon Day Cream** is your secret to radiant, fairer skin. This amazing cream gives you visibly brighter skin from the first week!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Fast Bright Vitamin C & Lemon Day Cream**: 
â­ Apply evenly to a perfectly cleansed face and neck.
â­ Avoid the delicate eye area.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Fast Bright Vitamin C & Lemon Day Cream**: 
â­ Vitamin C
â­ Lemon Extract
â­ UVA/UVB sun protection
â­ Other effective ingredients to smooth and brighten skin.

**Garnier Fast Bright Vitamin C & Lemon Day Cream** is enriched with 3X Vitamin C* & Lemon, known to visibly fade spots and brighten skin.  It visibly reduces the appearance of 3 types of spots - dark spots, UV spots, and pimple spots. For best results, use with Garnier Fast Fairness Face Wash and Garnier Fast Fairness Night Cream.

**Garnier Color Naturals**, 7.0 Blonde, permanent hair color with up to 100% grey coverage. â­ Nourishing hair color enriched with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter. â­ Post-color conditioner nourishes and adds shine. â­ Long-lasting, beautiful color. â­ Easy to use with clear instructions. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Color Naturals**: 
â­ Perform a skin allergy test before use. â­ Mix developer and colorant in a 1:1 ratio in a non-metallic bowl. â­ Apply to hair from roots to ends. â­ Leave for 30 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. â­ Use the included conditioner. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Color Naturals**: â­ Avocado Oil â­ Olive Oil â­ Shea Butter â­ Safe hair color ingredients.

description_en:
**Garnier Fast Bright Night Cream** is a rich yoghurt night cream designed to revitalize your skin overnight. â­Evens skin tone and reduces the appearance of dark spots. â­Unique formula combines yoghurt, lemon extract, and Vitamin C. â­Gently exfoliates and brightens skin. â­Leaves skin radiant and soft. â­Ideal for nighttime use. â­Apply to cleansed face and neck. â­Do not apply to the delicate eye contour area or irritated skin. â­No rinsing needed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Fast Bright Night Cream**: 
â­Apply every night to your perfectly cleansed face and neck. â­For best results, use with the corresponding day cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Fast Bright Night Cream**: â­Yoghurt, â­Lemon Extract, â­Vitamin C, â­and other effective skin brightening ingredients.

description_en:
**Garnier Hair Color Light Blonde 8** is a permanent hair color that nourishes your hair and covers up to 100% of gray hair. It contains a conditioner enriched with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter to nourish your hair after coloring. For a better color result, use **Garnier Hair Color Light Blonde 8**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Hair Color Light Blonde 8**:
â­ Perform a skin allergy test 24 hours prior to use.
â­ Mix the developer and colorant in a 1:1 ratio in a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Apply the color to the roots first, then the ends, dividing the hair into sections.
â­ Leave it for 30 minutes, then rinse thoroughly and apply the conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Hair Color Light Blonde 8**:
â­ Permanent hair color
â­ Conditioner enriched with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter

description_en:
**Garnier Skinactive Fast Clear 3 In 1 Exfoliating Wash** is a daily exfoliating wash enriched with Salicylic Acid to visibly reduce pimples. After the 1st use, expect -97% less excess oil and -99.9% less pimple-causing bacteria. In 28 days, expect -39% visible reduction of pimples.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skinactive Fast Clear 3 In 1 Exfoliating Wash**: 
â­ Gently massage onto wet face until it lathers.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skinactive Fast Clear 3 In 1 Exfoliating Wash**: 
â­ AQUA/WATER, GLYCERIN, MYRISTIC ACID, PALMITIC ACID, STEARIC ACID, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, LAURIC ACID,GLYCERYL DISTEARATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, KAOLIN, PERLITE,PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, PHENOXYETHANOL, PUMICE, SALICYLIC ACID,TETRASODIUM EDTA, CITRUS LIMON FRUIT EXTRACT / LEMON FRUITEXTRACT, PEG-14M, LINALOOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, LIMONENE,BENZYL ALCOHOL, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, GERANIOL . (F.I.L .: Z70019102/1).

Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.

**Garnier Men Shampoo Color 1.0 Black** is a men's hair color that's easy to use, like a shampoo! Achieve a natural-looking color that lasts up to 5 weeks. Formulated with coffee extract and nourishing argan oil, it's ammonia-free. Get a natural black color in just 5 minutes!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Men Shampoo Color 1.0 Black**: 
â­ Put on gloves. 
â­ Pour the mixture into your hands. 
â­ Apply it thoroughly to dry hair, just like shampoo. 
â­ Leave it for 5 minutes. 
â­ Rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Men Shampoo Color 1.0 Black**:
â­ Coffee Extract 
â­ Argan Oil

**Important:** Perform a skin allergy test 48 hours before use. Follow instructions carefully.

**Garnier Color Naturals Nude Medium Brown 5.132** is a permanent nourishing hair colorant that provides up to 100% grey coverage. Our after-color hair conditioner is enriched with avocado oil, olive oil and shea butter, nourishing hair even after coloring. With **Garnier Color Naturals Nude Medium Brown 5.132**, nourished hair means better color.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Color Naturals Nude Medium Brown 5.132**:
â­ Pour the developing cream and the coloring cream into a non-metallic bowl and mix well.
â­ Apply the mixture to your roots, then spread to the rest of your hair. Wait 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly and apply conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Color Naturals Nude Medium Brown 5.132**:
â­ Avocado Oil
â­ Olive Oil
â­ Shea Butter

description_en:
**Garnier 3% Vitamin C Niacinamide Ampoule 1.5 ml x 12 Pcs** is a fast-acting serum for an instant brightening effect.  It contains 3% Vitamin C and Niacinamide, clinically proven to reduce hyperpigmentation and brighten skin. See fast results after the first use, and in just 6 days, hyperpigmentation fades with a visible reduction in dullness, unevenness, dark spots, and dark eye circles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier 3% Vitamin C Niacinamide Ampoule 1.5 ml x 12 Pcs**:
â­ Apply all over cleansed face and neck, especially on areas of concern, by gently massaging it in.
â­ To open, hold the ampoule upright, push back the top tab, then squeeze.
â­ Apply 1 ampoule in the morning and another at night for best results in 6 days.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier 3% Vitamin C Niacinamide Ampoule 1.5 ml x 12 Pcs**:
â­Aqua / Water, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Peg/Ppg/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Methyl Gluceth-20, Linalool, Geraniol, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Parfum / Fragrance, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Caprylyl Glycol, Citrus Limon Fruit Extract / Lemon Fruit Extract, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Polysorbate 20, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5 (F.I.L Z280909/1)

description_en:
**Garnier Skin Active Fast Bright 3% Vitamin C & Niacinamide Serum 1 Ampoule 1.5 ml** Discover Garnier's latest skincare innovation! A concentrated dose of serum for a fast brightening effect, enriched with 3% Vitamin C and Niacinamide. Clinically proven to even out skin tone* and boost radiance. From the first dose, you'll notice brighter skin. In just 6 days, skin is more even-toned, with visibly reduced dark spots** and under-eye dark circles**. *Involving dullness, uneven skin tone, dark spots, age spots & undereye dark circles. **Based on color intensity. Note: Actual pictures from clinical study, individual results may vary. ^Vitamin CG = Vitamin C derivative. ^^Clinical study, 43 subjects.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skin Active Fast Bright 3% Vitamin C & Niacinamide Serum 1 Ampoule 1.5 ml**
â­ Apply all over cleansed face and neck, especially on areas of concern, by gently massaging it in.
â­ To open, push back the top tab of the ampoule before squeezing.
â­ Apply 1 dose in the morning and another at night for best results in 6 days.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skin Active Fast Bright 3% Vitamin C & Niacinamide Serum 1 Ampoule 1.5 ml**
â­ AQUA / WATER, NIACINAMIDE, GLYCERIN, PEG/PPG/POLYBUTYLENE GLYCOL-8/5/3 GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, METHYL GLUCETH-20, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, CARBOMER, TRIETHANOLAMINE, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, LIMONENE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CITRUS LIMON FRUIT EXTRACT / LEMON FRUIT EXTRACT, BIOSACCHARIDE GUM-1, POLYSORBATE 20, BENZYL SALICYLATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CI 19140 / YELLOW 5 (F.I.L Z280909/1)

description_en:
**Garnier Color Naturals 4.7 Frosted Truffle Brown** is a permanent hair color that nourishes your hair while providing rich, long-lasting color with up to 100% grey coverage.  **Garnier Color Naturals 4.7 Frosted Truffle Brown** is designed to give you a unique coloring experience that combines deep nourishment with stunning color. Its nourishing conditioner, enriched with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter, nourishes your hair before and after coloring, leaving it silky and shiny. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Color Naturals 4.7 Frosted Truffle Brown**:
â­ Pour the coloring cream and developer cream into a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Mix the ingredients well using the provided applicator brush.
â­ Apply the mixture to your roots first, then distribute the rest to your entire hair.
â­ Wait 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly, then apply the nourishing conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Color Naturals 4.7 Frosted Truffle Brown**:
â­ Richly pigmented coloring cream.
â­ Developer cream.
â­ Nourishing conditioner with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter.

description_en:
**Garnier Tissue Mask Ampoule Watermelon 1 pc**, the power of green sciences infused in AMPOULE SHEET MASK. â­ 1% HYALURONIC ACID is known for holding up to 1000x its weight in water. â­ Watermelon Extract is known for its fresh and super quenching effect. Paired with Hyaluronic acid in your plumping ampoule sheet mask. â­ Proven efficacy in 5mins: skin feels tightened,dehydrated fine lines appear visibly smoothed, skin feels revitalized. â­ Best to use: when skin feels tired and saggy, before a date or at seasonal change. â­ Consumer test, 77 women, after 1 application. â­ Infused with 1 full ampoule of a 15 ml serum.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Tissue Mask Ampoule Watermelon 1 pc**: â­ Unfold the mask and adjust it to the contours of your face. â­ Let your mask infuse your skin for 5mins. Feel Free to move around or just relax. â­ Your skin is fully recharged: you can remove the mask! Massage the excess residue into your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Tissue Mask Ampoule Watermelon 1 pc**: â­ 967544 12 - INGREDIENTS: AQUA / WATER, GLYCERIN, HYDROGENATED STARCH HYDROLYSATE, PROPANEDIOL, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, ALCOHOL, ANANAS SATIVUS FRUIT EXTRACT / PINEAPPLE FRUIT EXTRACT, CAPRYLYL/CAPRYL GLUCOSIDE, CITRIC ACID, CITRUS JUNOS FRUIT EXTRACT, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, MALTODEXTRIN, PANTHENOL, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, SODIUM CITRATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM PHYTATE, XANTHAN GUM, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE (F.I.L C263435/2).

description_en:
**Garnier Tissue Mask Ampoule Pineapple 1 pc**, an ampoule sheet mask* infused with the power of green sciences.
â­ Contains 1% Vitamin Cg to help restore a healthy glow. â­ Pineapple extract, a traditionally used acidulous superfood. â­ Paired with Vitamin Cg in this anti-fatigue ampoule sheet mask. â­ Proven efficacy in 5 minutes: skin is glowier, re-energized, and feels as rested as after a good nightâ€™s sleep. â­ Best to use: after a short night, while getting ready, at seasonal change, or before a date. â­ Consumer test, 96 women, after 1 application. â­ Infused with 1 full 15ml ampoule of serum.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Tissue Mask Ampoule Pineapple 1 pc**:
â­ Unfold the mask and adjust it to your face. â­ Leave on for 5 minutes. â­ Feel free to move around or relax. â­ Remove the mask and massage the excess into your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Tissue Mask Ampoule Pineapple 1 pc**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Propanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Alcohol, Ananas Sativus Fruit Extract/Pineapple Fruit Extract, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Citrus Junos Fruit Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Maltodextrin, Panthenol, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Phytate, Xanthan Gum, Parfum/Fragrance (F.I.L C263435/2).

description_en:
**Garnier Tissue Mask Ampoule Kale 1 pc**, a concentrated sheet mask inspired by green sciences. â­ 2% NIACINAMIDE helps to rebalance skin, is known to remove excess sebum and reduce blemishes. â­ Kale extract contributes to healthy-looking skin. â­ Paired with Niacinamide in your detox Ampoule sheet mask. â­ Proven Efficacy in 5mins*: Skin seems less shiny, is visibly purified, has a clean and healthy glow. â­ Best to use: the day after a cheat meal, when exposed to a polluted area, at seasonal change. â­ Consumer test, 72 women, after 1 application. â­ Infused with 1 full ampoule of a 15 ml serum.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Tissue Mask Ampoule Kale 1 pc**: â­ Unfold the mask and adjust it to the contours of your face. â­ Let your mask infuse your skin for 5 mins. â­ Feel free to move around or just relax. â­ Your skin is fully recharged: you can remove the mask! â­ Massage the excess residue into your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Tissue Mask Ampoule Kale 1 pc**: â­ AQUA / WATER, PROPANEDIOL, GLYCERIN, ALCOHOL, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, NIACINAMIDE, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, BRASSICA OLERACEA ACEPHALA LEAF EXTRACT, CAPRYLYL/CAPRYL GLUCOSIDE, CENTELLA ASIATICA EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, HYDROXY-ACETOPHENONE, KAOLIN, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SALICYLIC ACID, SODIUM BENZOATE, SODIUM CITRATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM PHYTATE, XANTHAN GUM, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE (F.I.L C263437/1).

description_en:
**Garnier SkinActive Vitamin C Shot Fresh-Mix Tissue Mask**, the refreshing face mask that gives you radiant and glowing skin. â­ The equivalent of 1 week of hydrating serum*. â­ The 1st Fresh-Mix Tissue Mask by Garnier. â­ A hydrating shot of Vitamin C. â­ Separate dry tissue mask made of algae. â­ Fresh and ultra-efficient. â­ Contains a plant-based moisturizing ingredient three times more effective. â­ Gives skin maximum radiance. â­ After just 15 minutes: skin is more refreshed, hydrated, and radiant. â­ After one week: skin looks radiant and luminous. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier SkinActive Vitamin C Shot Fresh-Mix Tissue Mask**: 
â­ Fold the sachet. â­ Press on the liquid. â­ Push the liquid into the mask. â­ Open the sachet and apply the mask to your face. â­ Leave it for 15 minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier SkinActive Vitamin C Shot Fresh-Mix Tissue Mask**: 
â­ Aqua/Water â­ Glycerin â­ Propanediol â­ Betaine â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil â­ Sodium Citrate â­ Sodium Hyaluronate â­ Algin â­ Ascorbyl Glucoside â­ Hydroxyacetophenone â­ Hydroxyethylcellulose â­ Citric Acid â­ CI 19140 â­ Parfum/Fragrance

description_en:
**Garnier Color Naturals 3.7 Dark Quartz** is a permanent nourishing hair colorant providing up to 100% grey coverage.  Our after-color conditioner is enriched with avocado oil, olive oil, and shea butter to nourish your hair even after coloring. With **Garnier Color Naturals 3.7 Dark Quartz**, nourished hair means better color. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Color Naturals 3.7 Dark Quartz**:
â­ Pour the developing cream and the coloring cream into a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Mix well using the applicator brush.
â­ Apply the mixture to your roots, then distribute the remaining mixture to the rest of your hair.
â­ Wait 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly and apply the conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Color Naturals 3.7 Dark Quartz**:
â­ Avocado Oil
â­ Olive Oil
â­ Shea Butter

description_en:
**Garnier Pure Active Clay 3 in 1 - 50 Ml** offers a 3-in-1 solution for clearer, healthier-looking skin. â­ Deeply cleanses and removes excess oil. â­ Gently exfoliates to remove dead skin cells. â­ Works as a mask to reveal a natural glow. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Pure Active Clay 3 in 1 - 50 Ml**: 
â­ Daily Wash: Apply to wet skin, massage gently, then rinse thoroughly. 
â­ Scrub: Use 1-2 times a week, focusing on areas prone to clogged pores. 
â­ Mask: Apply to dry skin and leave for 3 minutes before rinsing. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Pure Active Clay 3 in 1 - 50 Ml**: â­ Full ingredient list available on the packaging.

description_en:
**Garnier Skin Active Hydra Bomb Night Mask Deep Sea**: Experience overnight hydration with our intensely moisturizing night mask for a refreshed, replenished complexion. â­One **Garnier Skin Active Hydra Bomb Night Mask Deep Sea** equals one week of hydrating serum*. â­Apply before bed and leave on for 15 minutes. â­The formula, enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, Deep Sea Water and Cornflower, replenishes and repairs the skin barrier. â­Suitable for sensitive skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Garnier Skin Active Hydra Bomb Night Mask Deep Sea**: â­Before sleeping, unfold the mask and gently apply it to clean skin. â­Remove the blue protective film. â­Adjust the mask to the contours of your face and leave it on for 15 minutes. â­Remove the mask and gently massage the excess formula into your skin or remove with a cotton pad. â­Do not sleep with the mask on.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Garnier Skin Active Hydra Bomb Night Mask Deep Sea**: â­AQUA / WATER â— â­PROPYLENE GLYCOL â— â­GLYCERIN â— â­ARGININE â— â­CENTAUREA CYANUS FLOWER WATER â— â­CITRIC ACID â— â­COCO-BETAINE â— â­DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE â— â­GLYCERYL ACRYLATE/ACRYLIC ACID COPOLYMER â— â­HYDROGENATED STARCH HYDROLYSATE â— â­HYDROXYACETOPHENONE â— â­HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE â— â­LAVANDULA HYBRIDA OIL â— â­LIMONENE â— â­MANNOSE â— â­MARIS AQUA / SEA WATER â— â­P-ANISIC ACID â— â­PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL â— â­PHENOXYETHANOL â— â­POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE â— â­PROPANEDIOL â— â­PVM/MA COPOLYMER â— â­SODIUM HYALURONATE â— â­XANTHAN GUM â— â­PARFUM / FRAGRANCE â—

**Gatsby Gel Water Gloss Soft 150 gm** rediscovers the art of self-expression and perfects your style. This water-based, gloss gel provides a natural hairstyle with a soft finish, ideal for medium to long hair. Whether it's a casual tousle or a sleek look, **Gatsby Gel Water Gloss Soft 150 gm** offers versatility and confidence. Elevate your grooming routine and take your styling to the next level. It features a shine effect, is non-sticky, easy to wash off, and has a holding level of 2. A men's hair styling gel from a global Japanese brand, made in Indonesia.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Gatsby Gel Water Gloss Soft 150 gm**:
â­ Apply a small amount to your palm.
â­ Spread evenly throughout your hair.
â­ Style as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Gatsby Gel Water Gloss Soft 150 gm**:
â­ BPA Free
â­ Unscented

**Gatsby Styling Wax Power & Spikes - 75 gm** is perfect for men who want strong, spiky hairstyles that last. This wax gives you strong hold with easy restyling. Ideal for creating modern and British textured hairstyles. It gives your hair active movement with smooth styling abilities, helping to bundle and make the hair stand up subtly. Create a messy scrunch hairstyle with more texture and flow, arranging your desired hairstyle without stiffness or stickiness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Gatsby Styling Wax Power & Spikes - 75 gm**:
â­ Take an appropriate amount of wax and spread evenly on your palms until transparent.
â­ Apply and spread wax evenly on your hair.
â­ Arrange your hair to your desired style.
â­ Use GATSBY Set & Keep Spray (sold separately) for longer-lasting hold.

â­ Take an appropriate amount and rub on palms until transparent.

**Gatsby Hair Spray Extreme Hold 250 ml** provides all-day extreme hold with a natural shine and smooth finish.  Its unique formula leaves no sticky residue and is perfect for all hair types, especially short to medium length hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Gatsby Hair Spray Extreme Hold 250 ml**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.

description_en:
**Gatsby Styling Wax Tough & Shine - 75 gm** is the perfect choice for trendy young men who want to create stylish and modern hairstyles. It features a re-styling ability, giving you the flexibility to redesign your hairstyle throughout the day. Perfect for a modern British hairstyle with texture. It gives your hair active movement with smooth styling abilities, and helps to bundle the hair and make it stand up subtly. You can create a messy scrunch hairstyle with a great texture and flow, and arrange your desired hairstyle without stiffness and stickiness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Gatsby Styling Wax Tough & Shine - 75 gm**:
â­ Take an appropriate amount of wax and spread evenly on your palms until transparent.
â­ Apply and spread the wax on your hair.
â­ Arrange your hair based on your desired hairstyle.
â­ Use GATSBY Set & Keep Spray (if needed) for longer-lasting hold.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Gatsby Styling Wax Tough & Shine - 75 gm**:
â­ Non-sticky hair wax that provides a subtle look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Gillette Blue II Plus Disposable Razor**:

â­ Rinse the razor frequently during shaving.
â­ Use a moisturizer or aftershave balm afterwards.

â­ PEG-115M

**Gillette Razors Fusion Proglide Flexball Power** provides the most comfortable and precise shave. â­ Features ultra-thin blades with Low Cutting Force technology for less tug and pull. â­ FlexBall Technology perfectly follows facial contours to prevent nicks and irritation. â­ The enhanced Indicator Lubrastrip signals when to change the blade. â­ Power Handle provides soothing micropulses. â­ Use with Gillette Fusion ProGlide gel for best results. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Gillette Razors Fusion Proglide Flexball Power**: 
â­ Use a AAA alkaline battery. â­ Replace the battery when vibration slows or stops. â­ Do not leave a depleted battery in the device. â­ Replace batteries in a dry environment only. â­ Dispose of batteries properly. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Gillette Razors Fusion Proglide Flexball Power**: 
â­ Five anti-friction blades. â­ Enhanced Lubrastrip. â­ FlexBall Technology. â­ Precision trimmer. â­ Ergonomic handle.

**Gillette Razor Fusion Power + 1 Refill Blade** combines Gillette's advanced shaving technology with high performance for an exceptionally close, comfortable shave. â­ 5 blades spaced closer together for less irritation. â­ Flexible Comfort Guard with microfins contours to your face. â­ Moisturizing Lubrastrip for smooth glide. â­ Precision trimmer for hard-to-reach areas. â­ Ergonomic handle for optimal control. â­ Low battery indicator light. â­ Up to one month of shaves.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Gillette Razor Fusion Power + 1 Refill Blade**: â­ Replace battery when vibration slows or stops. â­ Do not leave a depleted battery in the device. â­ Replace batteries only in a dry environment. â­ Dispose of batteries according to local regulations. â­ Insert AAA alkaline battery correctly. â­ If a battery leaks, wipe the device clean with a damp cloth and wash your hands. â­ If any material gets into your eyes, contact a doctor immediately. â­ Keep batteries away from children. â­ If swallowed, consult a physician immediately.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Gillette Razor Fusion Power + 1 Refill Blade**: â­ 5 anti-friction blades. â­ Lubrastrip. â­ Precision trimmer. â­ Ergonomic handle with elastomer. â­ AAA battery.

description_en:
**Gillette SkinGuard Sensitive Razor + 2 Blades** is the perfect solution for men with sensitive skin. Designed for a comfortable and smooth shave without irritation. â­ Features unique SkinGuard technology positioned between the blades to protect skin from cuts and nicks. â­ Raised blades to minimize skin contact. â­ Soothing lubrastrip. â­ Comfortable grip for easy use. â­ Fits all SkinGuard sensitive blades. â­ Each blade lasts up to 15 shaves. â­ Ideal for all sensitive skin types. â­ Provides pre and post-shave skin protection. â­ Includes precision trimmer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Gillette SkinGuard Sensitive Razor + 2 Blades**: 
â­ Before shaving: Wash your face and neck with a soap-free face wash. â­ Use a moisturizing shave gel. â­ After shaving: Moisturize your skin immediately. â­ Change the blade at the first sign of discomfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Gillette SkinGuard Sensitive Razor + 2 Blades**: â­ Sharp blades. â­ SkinGuard technology. â­ Soothing lubrastrip. â­ Comfortable grip.
